GSP30partrvpu:5: vimalakalāśrayābhinavasṛṣṭimahā jananī bharitatanuś ca pañcamukhaguptarucir janakaḥ /

GSP30partrvpu:7: yasyām antar viśvam etad vibhāti bāhyābhāsaṃ bhāsamānaṃ visṛṣṭau /
GSP30partrvpu:8: kṣobhe kṣīṇe 'nuttarāyāṃ sthitau tāṃ vande devīṃ svātmasaṃvittim ekām // ParTriVi_Mang.2 //
GSP30partrvpu:9: naraśaktiśivātmakaṃ trikaṃ hṛdaye yā vinidhāya bhāsayet /
GSP30partrvpu:10: praṇamāmi parām anuttarāṃ nijabhāsāṃ pratibhācamatkṛtim // ParTriVi_Mang.3 //
GSP30partrvpu:12: śrīmān ādyaguruḥ śambhuḥ śrīkaṇṭhaḥ parameśvaraḥ // ParTriVi_Mang.4 //
GSP30partrvpu:21: parameśvaraḥ pañcavidhakṛtyamayaḥ satatam anugrahamayyā parārūpayā śaktyā ākrānto vastuto 'nugrahaikātmaiva na hi śaktiḥ śivād bhedam āmarśayet /
GSP30partrvpu:25_1: prathamataraṃ paramahāmantramayyām adeśakālakalitāyāṃ saṃvidi nirūḍhā tāvatpaśyantyudbhaviṣyaduktipratyuktyavibhāgenaiva vartate /
GSP30partrvpu:26: saiva ca sakalapramātṛsaṃvidadvayamayī satatam eva vartamānarūpā /
GSP30partrvpu:27: tatas tu paśyantī yad yat abhīpsitaṃ tat tad eva samucitakāraṇaniyamaprabodhitaṃ bodhasūtraṇamātreṇa vimṛśati,
GSP30partrvpu:28: yathā anekabhāvābhāvajñānasaṃskārasaṃskṛtāyā mecakadhiyaḥ smṛtibījaprabodhakaucityāt kiṃcid eva smṛtir vimṛśati /
GSP30partrvpu:29: na hi prathamajñānakāle bhedo 'trāsphurat yatra vācyavācakaviśeṣayor abhedaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:30: madhyamā punas tayor eva vācyavācakayor bhedam ādarśya sāmānādhikaraṇyena vimarśavyāpārā /
GSP30partrvpu:32_0: tadubhayabhedasphuṭatāmayy eva iti tāvadvyavasthāyāṃ svasaṃvitsiddhāyāṃ yaiva parāvāgbhūmiḥ
GSP30partrvpu:32_2: mantravīryabhūtāṃśacoditā taduttaraṃ paśyantyādidaśāsv api vastuto vyavasthitā /
GSP30partrvpu:34: tatra ca idam evam atra idānīm ityādibhedakalanā na kācit /
GSP30partrvpu:35_0: tata eva ca paramahāmantravīryavisṛṣṭirūpāyā ārabhya vaikharīprasṛtabhāvabhedaprakāśaparyantaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:35_1: yad iyaṃ svacamatkṛtimayī svātmany eva prakāśanamaye viśramya sphurati tad evaṃ sphuritam
GSP30partrvpu:37: tanmadhya eva tu paśyantyāṃ yatra bhedāṃśasyāsūtraṇaṃ yatra ca madhyamāyāṃ
GSP30partrvpu:38_0: bhedāvabhāsas tatrobhayatra jñānakriyāśaktimaye rūpe sadāśiveśvarasāre saiva aham
GSP30partrvpu:42: paraiva ca saṃvid bhagavatī devī ity ucyate /
GSP30partrvpu:44: sarvottīrṇatvena sarvotkarṣāvasthiter bhagavato bhairavasya tathā sthātum icchayā vijigīṣātmanā,
GSP30partrvpu:46: sarvatra ca bhāsamāne nīlādau tannīlādyātmabhāsanarūpeṇa dyotanena,
GSP30partrvpu:49: ata eva mukhyato bhairavanāthasyaiva devatvam iṣyate /
GSP30partrvpu:53: bhagavatī paśyantī madhyamā ca svātmānam eva yadā vimṛśati aham eva parāvāgdevatāmayī evam avocam iti,
GSP30partrvpu:54: tadā tena rūpeṇollasanmāyārambhatayā svātmāpekṣatayā tanmāyīyabhedānusārāt tām eva parābhuvaṃ svātmamayīṃ bhūtatvena abhimanvānā,
GSP30partrvpu:58_0: antaś ca prāṇacārādau prāṇīyaśatasahasrāṃśe 'pi aharvyavahāra ity anavasthitaṃ kālpanikaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:58_1: cādyatanatvam akālpanike saṃvidvapuṣi katham iti nyāyāt bhūtānadyatanaparokṣārthaparipūraṇāt
GSP30partrvpu:61: supto' haṃ kila vilalāpa iti hy evam evopapattiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:62: tathāhi tām atītām avasthāṃ na smarati prāgavedyatvāt,
GSP30partrvpu:63: idānīṃ puruṣāntarakathitamāhātmyāt ativilāpagānādikriyājanitagadgadikādidehavikriyāveśena vā tadavasthāṃ camatkārāt pratipadyate /
GSP30partrvpu:65: mattaḥ supto vāhaṃ kila vilalāpa iti madasvapnamūrchādiṣu hi vedyaviśeṣānavagamāt parokṣatvam,
GSP30partrvpu:73: evaṃ sarva eva pramātā guruśiṣyādipade anyatra vā vyavahāre sthitaḥ sarvakālam eva yat kiṃcit kurvāṇa enām eva saṃvidam anupraviśya sarvavyavahārabhājanaṃ bhavati /
GSP30partrvpu:74: atas tām eva vastuto vimṛśati devī uvāca iti /
GSP30partrvpu:75: yāvad uktaṃ syād aham eva satataṃ sarvam abhedena vimṛśāmi parābhūmau,
GSP30partrvpu:76: anyathā paśyantīmadhyamābhūmigaṃ sphuṭam idaṃ prathanaṃ na syāt,
GSP30partrvpu:77: tāvad evoktaṃ bhavati devī uvāca iti /
GSP30partrvpu:78: evam eva purastād bhairava uvāca iti mantavyam /
GSP30partrvpu:79: tatrāpi hi svaparaśaktyavibhāgamayo bhairavātmaiva aham uvāca ity arthaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:80: kevalaṃ śaktipradhānatayā sṛṣṭisvabhāvākhyāmarśe aham ity ucito devīparāmarśaḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:84: etac ca paśyantīmadhyamābhuvi jñānaśaktimayyām eva parasyā icchāśaktimayyāḥ saṃvido vimarśanaṃ,
GSP30partrvpu:86: ata eva jñanaśaktāv eva sadāśivamayyāṃ pūrvottarapadavākyakramollāsād vāstavaparamahāmantravīryavimarśa eva dakāraekāravakārayakāraukāravakāraākāracakāra,
GSP30partrvpu:89: Q: guruśiṣyapade sthitvā svayaṃ devaḥ sadāśivaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:91: iti / evaṃ cānugrahaśaktiḥ satataṃ sarvapramātṛṣv anastamitaiveti saiṣa ṣaḍardhasāraśāstraikaprāṇaḥ para eva saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:95: Q: anugrahātmā sraṣṭā ca saṃhartā cāniyantritaḥ // [TriHṛ]
GSP30partrvpu:100_0: evaṃparamārthamayatvāt parameśvarasya cittattvasya yad evāvibhāgenāntarvastu sphuritaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:100_1: tad eva paśyantībhuvi varṇapadavākyavibibhājayiṣayā parāmṛṣṭaṃ madhyamāpade ca bhedena
GSP30partrvpu:100_2: sthitaṃ vastupūrvakaṃ saṃpannaṃ yāvad vaikharyantam anuttaraṃ katham ityādi bhinnamāyīyavarṇapadavākyaracanāntam /
GSP30partrvpu:101: etad eva tad anupalakṣyaṃ bhairavavaktraṃ sṛṣṭiparāmarśātmakam,
GSP30partrvpu:103: ata eva vyavacchedābhāvāt sthānanirdeśādyayogāt sthānādipūrvakatvaṃ nopapannam /
GSP30partrvpu:104: vastu ca praśnataduttararūpaṃ satatoditam eva prathamam avibhāgamayam /
GSP30partrvpu:105: tena etāvad evātra tātparyam svātmā sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ svayaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:106: prathamānaḥ svātmānam eva svātmāvibhinnena praśnaprativacanena praṣṭṛprativaktṛsvātmamayenāhantayā camatkurvan vimṛśatīti /
GSP30partrvpu:107: aham evaivaṃvicitracamatkārecchus tathā jānann eva tathaiva bhavāmīti yāvat tāvad eva devī uvāca,
GSP30partrvpu:108: anuttaraṃ katham ity ārabhya bhairava uvāca śṛṇu devi iti madhyato yāvad ity etad rudrayāmalam iti /
GSP30partrvpu:109: yad vā sarvāṇi pañcasrotaḥprabhṛtīni śāstrāṇi yāvat laukiko 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:114: sarveṣu vyavahāreṣu jñeyaṃ kāryaṃ ca yad bhavet /
GSP30partrvpu:118: madhyā paśyanty atha parām adhyāsyābhedato bhṛśam /
GSP30partrvpu:128: tadgranthinirdalanārtha eva ayam asmākaṃ tacchāsanapavitritānāṃ yatnaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:131: tisṛṇāṃ śaktīnām icchājñānakriyāṇāṃ sṛṣṭyādyudyogādināmāntaranirvācyānām īśikā īśvarī /
GSP30partrvpu:132: īśanā ca īśitavyāvyatirekeṇaiva bhāvinīti etacchaktibhedatrayottīrṇā tacchaktyavibhāgamayī saṃvidbhagavatī bhaṭṭārikā parā abhidheyam,
GSP30partrvpu:135: akṣaravarṇasāmyāt ca niruktam āhuḥ tisraḥ śaktīḥ kāyatīti triṃśakā,
GSP30partrvpu:140_0: iti / abhidhānābhidheyayoś ca para eva saṃbandhas tādātmyād ity uktaprāyaṃ prayojanaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:141: prāṇadehādibhūmāv eva hy antarbahiṣkaraṇaviṣayāyāṃ preraṇākhyāyām udyogabalajīvanādirūpāyāṃ rūḍhasya bandhābhimatebhyo muktir iti gīyate /
GSP30partrvpu:142: truṭite 'pi hi māyīye saṃskāramātre keyaṃ muktivācoyuktiḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:145: Q: iti vā yasya saṃvittiḥ krīḍātvenākhilaṃ jagat /
GSP30partrvpu:146: Q: sa paśyan satataṃ yukto jīvanmukto na saṃśayaḥ // [SpaKā 2.5]
GSP30partrvpu:147: iti / sphuṭībhaviṣyati ca etat avidūra eva /
GSP30partrvpu:149: tadanena svasaṃvedanena prayojanam eva atra sakalapumarthaparyavasānam iti prayojanaprayojanānavakāśaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:157: yathā hi tattvāntarāṇī ṣaṭtriṃśad anāśritaśivaparyan tāni parabhairavabodhānupraveśāsāditatathābhāvasiddhīni saṃvidam adhikayanti naivaṃ parā paripūrṇā parabhairavasaṃvit,
GSP30partrvpu:159: [2.] tathā na vidyaty uttaraṃ praśnaprativacorūpaṃ yatra /
GSP30partrvpu:160: yata eva hi mahāsaṃvitsindhor ullasadanantapratibhāparyantadhāmna ullāsya praśnapratibhānādipātraṃ bhavati śiṣyaḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:161: tad eva vastutas tattvaṃ satatoditam iti kimiva ācāryīyam uttaram anyat syāt /
GSP30partrvpu:164: tathā hi prathamaṃ śarīrāt prāṇabhūmāv anupraviśya,
GSP30partrvpu:169: tato 'pi sakalamalatānavatāratamyātiśayadhārāprāptau śivatvavyaktyā aṇur apavṛjyate āropavyarthatvāt iti /
GSP30partrvpu:171: [5.] tathā uttaranti ata iti uttaro bandhaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:173: tad evaṃvidhā uttarā yatra na santi /
GSP30partrvpu:175: tat sarvathā īdṛśaṃ tādṛśam iti vyavacchedaṃ kuryāt /
GSP30partrvpu:176: tad yatra na bhavaty avyavacchinnam idam anuttaram /
GSP30partrvpu:177: [8.] idam ity api hi vyavacchinnottaravyavacchedaprāṇam eveti vyavacchedakatvāt vikalpātmaiva /
GSP30partrvpu:178: ata eva yāvad anuttare rūpe pravivikṣur māyīyaḥ pramātā tāvat kalpita eva viśeṣātmani /
GSP30partrvpu:182: tatra hi bhāvanāder anupapattir eva vastuta iti bhāvanākaraṇojjhitatvam uktam,
GSP30partrvpu:184: [9.] tad īdṛśam anuttaraṃ vyavahāravṛttiṣv apy evam eva /
GSP30partrvpu:189: Q: vitata iva nabhasy avicchidaiva pratanu patan na vibhāvyate jalaughaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:192: Q: ... parabhairavo 'tisaukṣmyād anubhavagocaram eti naiva jātu //
GSP30partrvpu:194: Q: janayanto hy anubhāvinīṃ citiṃ te jhaṭiti nyakkṛtabhairavīyabodhāḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:195: itiyādi / tathā ca vakṣyate uttarasyāpy anuttaram iti /
GSP30partrvpu:197: [10.] evam eva narātmanaḥ śāktam uttaraṃ tato 'pi śāmbhavam /
GSP30partrvpu:198: tathā teṣv api bhūtatattvātmamantreśvaraśaktyādibhedena svātmany eva uttarottaratvam,
GSP30partrvpu:204: jāgradādiṣv api svātmany eva caturādibhedatayā uttarottaratvam /
GSP30partrvpu:205: tad etat śrīpūrvapañcikāyāṃ mayaiva vistarato nirṇītam iha anupayogād granthagauravāc ca na vitatyoktam /
GSP30partrvpu:207: tathā viprarājanyaviṭsūdrāntyajātivibhāgamayam ūnādhikatvaṃ yatra na syāt /
GSP30partrvpu:215: tena haṃsaprāṇādiśūnyaviṣuvatprabhṛtisthānabhedaparipāṭyā sakale niṣkale 'pi vā pūrṇāhutiyojanikādisthityā mokṣadāṃ dīkṣāṃ vidhatte /
GSP30partrvpu:216: tad atra caitanyasya svaprakāśasya vyāpino de śakālākāraviśeṣāviśeṣitasya kathaṃkāram imā viḍambanāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:220: tad evaṃvidho nudā preraṇena taras taraṇaṃ yatra na bhavati tad anuttaram /
GSP30partrvpu:222: Q: evaṃ yo vetti tattvena tasya nirvāṇagāminī /
GSP30partrvpu:224: iti / [14.] aniti svasitīti kvipi an aṇur ātmā dehapuryaṣṭakādiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:233: paratrāpi hi svavad dehādir eva pṛthaktayā bhāti /
GSP30partrvpu:234: yat punaḥ prāṇanaṃ tad abhedenaiva svaprakāśam /
GSP30partrvpu:235: etad eva ca paramārtho yad uktaṃ śrīmadutpaladevapādaiḥ
GSP30partrvpu:236: Q: jñānaṃ kriyā ca bhūtānāṃ jīvatāṃ jīvanaṃ matam /
GSP30partrvpu:238: iti / tathā jīvanaṃ jñānakriye eva iti /
GSP30partrvpu:239_2: tasyā eva vakṣyamāṇanayena yeyaṃ nud visargāntatā tasyā eva taraḥ plavanaṃ sarvoparivṛttitvaṃ yatra /
GSP30partrvpu:240: [16.] avidyamānā deśakālagamanāgamanādidvaitasāpekṣā nut preraṇā kramātmakakriyāmayī yatra tat anud ākāśādi lokaprasiddhyā /
GSP30partrvpu:242: tasyāpi hy ākāśādeḥ saṃyogighaṭādicitropādhivaśāt samavāyiśabdādiyogāc ca syād api īdṛśī sakramā kriyā /
GSP30partrvpu:244_2: matsyodarīmatādiprasiddhā vimarśābhidhā kriyā iti tad eva anuttaram /
GSP30partrvpu:251: ayam anayor atiśayena śukla iti vākye 'yam arthaḥ anayoḥ śuklayoḥ madhyāt atiśayenāyaṃ śuklaḥ śuklataraḥ leṣāṃ tu śuklānām ayam atiśayena śukla iti ko 'yam adhiko 'rthaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:256: tatra prāsādo 'pi śuklaḥ paṭo 'pi śukla iti kim iva adhikam uktaṃ syāt /
GSP30partrvpu:258: na ca tarapaḥ tamap adhikam atiśayam abhidadhyāt,
GSP30partrvpu:267: na ca dviprabhṛtyapekṣā bhavati ekasya yugapat,
GSP30partrvpu:268: ekaikāpekṣā matā iti tasya krameṇa nādhiko 'rthaḥ kaścit /
GSP30partrvpu:269: tāratamyam iti tu prayogaḥ kramātiśaye 'vyutpanna eva /
GSP30partrvpu:270: na tu taraptamappratyayārthānugamāt tāryaṃ tāmyam ityādy api hi syāt /
GSP30partrvpu:272: iha tūttarakramikapratiyogyapekṣāyām anuttamam ity api prayoge ayam evārthaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:274: Q: adyāpi yan na viditaṃ siddhānāṃ bodhaśālinām /
GSP30partrvpu:275: Q: na cāpy aviditaṃ kasya kim apy etad anuttamam // [? /cf TaĀl 2.28]
GSP30partrvpu:278: Q: sakramatvaṃ ca laukikyāḥ kriyāyāḥ kālaśaktitaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:279: Q: ghaṭate na tu śāsvatyāḥ prābhavyāḥ syāt prabhor iva // [/IPK 2.1.2]
GSP30partrvpu:283: iti / tat vyākhyātam idam anuttaraṃ ṣoḍaśadhā /
GSP30partrvpu:285: Q: anuttaraṃ tad dhṛdayaṃ hṛdaye granthirūpatā /
GSP30partrvpu:286: Q: granthiṃ ṣoḍaśadhā jñātvā kuryāt karma yathāsukham // [Trikasāra ?]
GSP30partrvpu:288: Q: hṛdaye yaḥ sthito granthiḥ [adha ūrdhvaniyāmakaḥ, /
GSP30partrvpu:292: tad īdṛg anuttaraṃ kena prakāreṇa kim uttararūpaparityāgena utasvid anyatheti /
GSP30partrvpu:294: yad anuttaraṃ sarvam idaṃ hi jñānajñeyajātaṃ sarvata evānyonyaṃ bhedamayaṃ virodham upalabhate,
GSP30partrvpu:296: kasmiṃś ca prakāre mokṣa eva kiṃ vā bandhābhimate 'pīti /
GSP30partrvpu:297: thamupratyayasya vibhaktiviśeṣārthāniyamena prakāramātre vidhānāt prakāramātraviṣaya evāyaṃ praśnaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:301: tathā kulaṃ bodhasyaiva āśyānarūpatayā yathāvasthānād bodhasvātantryād eva cāsya bandhābhimānāt /
GSP30partrvpu:302: uktaṃ hi kula saṃstyāne bandhuṣu ca iti /
GSP30partrvpu:303: na hi prakāśaikātmakabodhaikarūpatvād ṛte kim apy eṣām aprakāśamānaṃ vapur upapadyate /
GSP30partrvpu:304: tatra kule bhavā kaulikī siddhis tathātvadārḍhyaṃ parinirvṛtyānandarūpaṃ hṛdayasvabhāvaparasaṃvidātmakaśivavimarśatādātmayam /
GSP30partrvpu:306: anuttarasvarūpatādātmye hi kulaṃ tathā bhavati / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:308: Q: vyavasthitiḥ pratiṣṭhātha siddhir nirvṛtir ucyate //
GSP30partrvpu:310: iti / sadya iti śabdaḥ samāne ahani ity arthavṛttir uktanayena ahno 'navasthitatvāt samāne kṣaṇe ity atrārthe vartate /
GSP30partrvpu:317_0: atas tasminn eva kṣaṇa iti vartamānakṣaṇasya sāvadhāraṇatvena bhūtabhaviṣyatkṣaṇāntaranirāse
GSP30partrvpu:317_1: tadubhayāpekṣakalanāprāṇāṃ vartamānasyāpi kālatāṃ nirasyeta yato yāvad idaṃ parameśvarasya
GSP30partrvpu:319: tadā tad eva paramānandāmṛtāsvādamayam adeśakālakalitam anuttaraṃ dhruvaṃ visargarūpaṃ satatoditaṃ /
GSP30partrvpu:321: Q: saṃrudhya raśmicakraṃ svaṃ pītvāmṛtam anuttamam /
GSP30partrvpu:325: iti / vistāritaś ca vistarato 'nyatra mayaiva kālobhayāparicchedaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:326: tathā kulāt prāṇadehāder āgatā siddhir bhedaprāṇānāṃ nīlasukhādīnāṃ niścayarūpā tāṃ dadātīti /
GSP30partrvpu:327: śarīrādayo hi jhagiti anuttaradhruvavisargavīryāveśena akālakalitena prāṇādimadhyamasopānāroheṇaiva bhāvānāṃ tathātvaniścayarupāṃ siddhiṃ vidadhate / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:328: Q: api tv ātmabalasparśāt puruṣas tatsamo bhavet [Spandakārikā 1.8]
GSP30partrvpu:332: iti / tathā kule śivaśaktyātmani saṃnihite 'pi siddhir uktanayena jīvanmuktatāmayī samabhilaṣitāṇimādiprasavapadaṃ /
GSP30partrvpu:333: tāṃ sadyaḥ anākalitam eva bhāvanākaraṇādirahitatvenaiva dadāti /
GSP30partrvpu:335: Q: bhāvanākaranābhyāṃ kiṃ śivasya satatoditeḥ / [Śivadṛṣṭi 8.5,6 CHECK]
GSP30partrvpu:337: Q: ekavāraṃ pramāṇena śāstrād vā guruvākyataḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:338: Q: jñāte śivatve sarvasthe pratipattyā dṛḍhātmanā //
GSP30partrvpu:339: Q: karaṇena nāsti kṛtyaṃ kvāpi bhāvanayāpi vā / [Śivadṛṣṭi 7.556?CHECK]
GSP30partrvpu:340: iti / kule jātā siddhiḥ śāktahādirūpaprasaraṇād ārabhya bahirbhāvapaṭalavikāsaparyantaṃ bhedāvabhāsanā / tāṃ dadāti /
GSP30partrvpu:344: tad eva hy anuttaraṃ mahāprakāśātma antaḥkṛtabodhamayaviśvabhāvaprasaram anuttaratvād eva niratiśayasvātantryaiśvaryacamatkārabharād bhedaṃ vikāsayati /
GSP30partrvpu:345: na hy aprakāśarūpaṃ bhāvavikāsaprakāśe kāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP30partrvpu:346: prakāśātmakaṃ cen nūnaṃ tat parameśvarabhairavabhaṭṭārakarūpam eveti kim apareṇa vāgjālena /
GSP30partrvpu:347: tathā yena anuttareṇa viśeṣeṇa jñātā mātrā mānena pramātmanā trāṇaṃ pālanaṃ patitvaṃ yāsāṃ pramātṛpramāṇaprameyapramitirūpāṇāṃ tā mātrā vijñātā yena tat vijñātamātraṃ /
GSP30partrvpu:348: tathā viśeṣeṇa pratipattidārḍhyabandhena yaj jñātaṃ tad vibhātam eva,
GSP30partrvpu:358: khe brahmaṇy abhedarūpe sthitvā carati viṣayam avagamayati /
GSP30partrvpu:359: tathā hānādānādiceṣṭāṃ vidhatte svarūpe cāste iti khecary antarbahiṣkaraṇatadarthasukhādinīlādirūpā /
GSP30partrvpu:360_1: sphuṭabhedodreke ca krameṇa vyomacarīgocarīdikcarībhūcarībhūtā yāḥ śaktayas tā vastuta
GSP30partrvpu:360_2: uktanayena svabhāvacarakhecarīrūpaśaktyavibhaktā evety ekaiva sā pārameśvarī śaktiḥ / yad uktam
GSP30partrvpu:361: Q: śaktayo 'sya jagat kṛtsnaṃ śaktimāṃs tu maheśvaraḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:364: na hy ātmano manasa indriyāṇāṃ bāhyānāṃ ca bhedaviṣayasya vyavasthāpanaṃ vyavasthā ca yujyate,
GSP30partrvpu:368: aṇumātram apy avikalānuttarasvarūpāparijñānam eva cittavṛttīnāṃ vaiṣamyam,
GSP30partrvpu:381: Q: sukhe duḥkhe vimohe ca sthito 'haṃ paramaḥ śivaḥ / [Śivadṛṣṭi 7.105]
GSP30partrvpu:384_0: ityādi / krodhādivṛttayo hi ciccamatkāratādātmyād anyathā tatsvarūpalābhasyaivāyogāc
GSP30partrvpu:384_1: ca parameśvaryaḥ karaṇadevatā eva bhagavatyas tās tāḥ krīḍā vitanvatyaḥ śivārkasya dīdhitirūpāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:388: Q: tā eva devadevasya raśmayaḥ kādidhārikāḥ / [Mataśāstra?]
GSP30partrvpu:389_0: ityādi / tathātvena tv aparijñātasvarūpāś ciccamatkāraṃ vikalpe 'pi nirvikalpaikasāraṃ
GSP30partrvpu:389_1: tena tena vicitravarṇākṣarapuñjātmanā ghoratarātmanā vikalparūpeṇa devatātmanā śaṅkātaṅkānupraveśena
GSP30partrvpu:393: Q: pīṭheśvaryo mahāghorā mohayanti muhur muhuḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:396: Q: viṣayeṣv eva saṃlīnān adho 'dhaḥ pātayanty aṇūn /
GSP30partrvpu:400: Q: kalāviluptavibhavo gataḥ san sa paśuḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:404: Q: yadā tv ekatra saṃrūḍhas tadā tasya layodbhavau /
GSP30partrvpu:405: Q: niyacchan bhoktṛtām eti tataś cakreśvaro bhavet //
GSP30partrvpu:407_0: iti / svarūpaparijñānaṃ ca etāvad eva yad etāsu vṛttiṣūdayasamayanirvikalpaikarūpāsu
GSP30partrvpu:408: yat tasya prāktananirvikalpaikavyavahāramayasya vikalpātmano mātuḥ svarūpaṃ khaṇḍayet /
GSP30partrvpu:409: na ca vikalpā anubhavād vikalpāntarād vā bhinnāḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:412: tac cānuttarasvarūpaparijñānam eva satatoditaṃ parameśvaryāḥ śivātmani saṃghaṭṭasamāpattyā ubhayavimarśānandarūḍhi /
GSP30partrvpu:413: śivo hi paravāṅmayamahāmantravīryavisṛṣṭimayaḥ parameśvarīvisṛṣṭyā tadvīryaghanatātmakaprasūnanirbharayā sṛṣṭyā yujyate
GSP30partrvpu:414: / tathā hi sarveṣām antarbahiṣkaraṇānāṃ yad yad anupraviśati tat tan madhyamanāḍībhuvi sarvāñgānuprāṇanasārāyāṃ prāṇātmanā cetanarūpeṇāste yad oja iti kathyate /
GSP30partrvpu:419: tato 'pi punar api nayanaśravaṇādīndriyadvāreṇa bṛṃhakarūpaṃ rūpaśabdādy anupraviśad bṛṃhakatvād eva tadvīryakṣobharūpakāmānalaprabodhakaṃ bhavati / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:421: ityādi / ekenaiva ca rūpādyanyatamenodriktaprāktanabalopabṛṃhitasya sarvaviṣayakaraṇīyoktakṣobhakaraṇasamarthatvaṃ sarvasya sarvasya sarvasarvātmakatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:423: paripuṣṭasarvamayamahāvīryam eva puṣṭikāri na tv apūrṇaṃ nāpi kṣīnam samucitaṃ śaiśavavārddhakayor /
GSP30partrvpu:424: vīryavikṣobhe ca vīryasya svamayatvenābhinnasyāpy adeśakālakalitaspandamayamahāvisargarūpam eva paripūrṇabhairavasaṃvidātmakaṃ svātantryam ānandaśaktimayaṃ sukhaprasavabhūḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:425: nayanayor api hi rūpaṃ tadvīryakṣobhātmakamahāvisargaviśleṣaṇayuktyā eva sukhadāyi bhavati /
GSP30partrvpu:427: anyatrāpīndriye anyat kevalaṃ paripūrṇasṛṣṭitām nāśnute svātmany evocchalanāt
GSP30partrvpu:429: yathā yathā ca na bṛṃhakaṃ bhavati tathā tathā parimitacamatkāraparyavasānam /
GSP30partrvpu:434_0: antarvyavasthitaṃ hi yat tad dayitasutasukhādi vīryātmakaṃ tad eva bhāvanāsadṛśadṛgākrandādibodhena
GSP30partrvpu:434_1: kṣobhātmakam vikāsam āpannaṃ punar na bhaviṣyatīti nairapekṣyavaśasaviśeṣacamatkriyātma
GSP30partrvpu:441: tathā hi tanmadhyanāḍīrūpasyobhayaliṅgātmano 'pi tadvīryotsāhabalalabdhāvaṣṭambhasya kampakāle sakalavīryakṣobhojjigamiṣātmakam antaḥsparśasukhaṃ svasaṃvitsākṣikam eva /
GSP30partrvpu:455_0: iti / bharāt smaryamāṇo hi sa sparśas tatsparśakṣetre ca madhyamākṛtrimaparātmakaśaktinālikāpratibimbitas
GSP30partrvpu:460: Q: yat sukhaṃ brahmatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyam ucyate //
GSP30partrvpu:465: Q: mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham /
GSP30partrvpu:466: Q: saṃbhavaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tato bhavati bhārata //
GSP30partrvpu:470: Q: bhagavatyā ratasthāyā praśna iti paraikamayatve 'pi tanmayamahadantarālābhiprāyeṇa/
GSP30partrvpu:473: tad idam anuttaraṃ kaulikasiddhidaṃ yena jñātamātreṇa khecarīsāmyam uktanayena
GSP30partrvpu:476: etad guhyaṃ mahāguhyaṃ kathayasva mama prabho /
GSP30partrvpu:479: yato guhāyāṃ svarūpāparijñānamayyāṃ satyāṃ sthitam apy aprakaṭam /
GSP30partrvpu:480: atha ca mahad aguhyaṃ sarvasya evaṃvidhacamatkāramayatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:481: mātṛmānameyamayabhedāvibhāgaśālinī bhagavatī śuddhavidyaiva trikoṇā māyāyām atiśayapratiphalitabhedāvagrahā bhavatīti māyāpi jagajjananabhūr vidyaiva vastutaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:482: tad uktena nayena saivaṃbhūtatvena parijñāyamānatvād abhedamāhātmyatirohitatatpramātrādikoṇatrayatvān mahāguhety ucyate /
GSP30partrvpu:483: saiva ca vastutaḥ pūjādhāma triśūlaṃ trikārthe / tad uktam
GSP30partrvpu:484: Q: sa trikoṇā mahāvidyā trikā sarvarasāspadam /
GSP30partrvpu:485: Q: visargapadam evaiṣa tasmāt saṃpūjayet trikam / [?]
GSP30partrvpu:489: iti / tataś ca īdṛśyāṃ mahāguhāyāṃ śuddhavidyāhṛdayamayyāṃ mahāsṛṣṭirūpāyāṃ jagajjanmabhūmau svacamatkārarūpeṇa bhavati yan maha iti yad etad guhyam /
GSP30partrvpu:490: etena hi yad idam avicchinnabhairavabhāsāvimarśarūpaṃ svātantryaṃ bhāvebhyaḥ svarūpapratyupasaṃhārakrameṇa ātmavimarśaviśrāntirūpatvam /
GSP30partrvpu:495_0: tathā hi sṛṣṭikrameṇa yathāvikṛtānuttaradhruvarūpaviśrānto bhairavabhaṭṭārakaḥ sakalakalājālajīvanabhūtaḥ
GSP30partrvpu:495_1: sarvasyādisiddho 'kalātmakaḥ sa eva prasarātmanā rūpeṇa visargarūpatām aśnuvāno visargasyaiva
GSP30partrvpu:496: tathā punar api tanmūlatriśūlaprāṇaparaśaktitrayopasaṃhāre tadvisargaviśleṣaṇayā mūladhruvapadānuttarapraveśaḥ sarvadā /
GSP30partrvpu:498: mahe paramānandarūpe pūrvokte yad idam uktanayena a iti rūpaṃ tad eva guhyam /
GSP30partrvpu:501: sva ātman eva he prabho evaṃvidhavaicitryakāritayā prabhavanaśīla /
GSP30partrvpu:503: etat / tac cāmantryasyāmantrakaṃ prati tādātmyam ābhimukhyaṃ prātipadikārthād adhikārthadāyi / yathoktam /
GSP30partrvpu:508: etat kathaya parāvāgrūpatayāvibhaktaṃ sthitam api paśyantībhuvi vākyaprabandhakramāsūtraṇena yojaya /
GSP30partrvpu:511: ityādi / parābhaṭṭārikāyāś ca paśyantyāditādātmyaṃ nirṇītaṃ prāg eva /
GSP30partrvpu:515: tathā mama ity asya pratyagātmasaṃbandhitvasya idaṃbhāvasya yad guhyaṃ maha ity uktam aham iti /
GSP30partrvpu:516: tathā hi mamedaṃ bhāsata iti yad bhāsanaṃ tasya vimarśaḥ punar apy ahaṃbhāvaikasāraḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:517: sa punar ahaṃbhāvo bhāvapratyupasaṃharaṇamukheneti maha ity etadrūpa eva yathoktaṃ prāk / yad uktam
GSP30partrvpu:518: Q: idam ity asya vicchinnavimarśasya kṛtārthatā /
GSP30partrvpu:519: Q: yā svasvarūpe viśrāntir vimarśaḥ so 'ham ity ayam //
GSP30partrvpu:523: Q: pareśaśaktir ātmeva bhāsate na tv idantayā //
GSP30partrvpu:528: tathā svamama suṣṭhv avidyamānaṃ mama iti yasya /
GSP30partrvpu:529: ahantābharaikarūḍhatvāt viśvaṃ na kiṃcid yasya vyatiriktanirdeśaprāṇaṣaṣṭyarthayogi bhavati /
GSP30partrvpu:530: śāstrāntaradīkṣitānāṃ vijñānākalānāṃ pralayakevalināṃ ca yady api mameti vyatiriktaṃ nāsti tathāpi yad bhedayogyatāvāsanā syād eva prabodhasamaye tadvikāsāt ahaṃbhāvārūḍhiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:533: Q: yan na kiṃcana mameti dīnatāṃ prāpnuvanti jaḍajantavo 'niśam /
GSP30partrvpu:534: Q: tan na kiṃcana mamāsmi sarvam ity uddhurāṃ dhuram upeyivān aham // [? Stotra of Abh.]
GSP30partrvpu:535: iti / śobhanena dvaitakalaṅkāṅkanākāluṣyaleṣaśūnyenāmena paramārthopadeśadvayātmanā jñānena mā mānam avabodho yasya svaprakāśaikarūpatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:538: avidyamānaṃ mā mānaṃ niṣedhaś ca yatra,
GSP30partrvpu:541: amā śobhanā satatoditā yatra māyāyāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahṛtau sā tādṛśī mā yasyeti bahuvrīhyantaṃ bahuvrīhiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:545: parameśvaro hi pramāṇādivyavahāre 'pi paraśaktimaya eva sarvathādvaitarūpatvāt tasya /
GSP30partrvpu:551: hṛdayasthā tu yā śaktiḥ kaulinī kulanāyikā // ParTri_2 //
GSP30partrvpu:552: tāṃ me kathaya deveśa yena tṛptiṃ labhāmy aham /
GSP30partrvpu:554: sarvasya nīlasukhāder dehaprāṇabuddhyādeś ca paraṃ pratiṣṭhāsthānaṃ saṃvidātma hṛt /
GSP30partrvpu:556_0: tatsthā iyaṃ sphuraṇamayī śaktiḥ kulasya nāyikā śarīraprāṇasukhādeḥ sphurattādāyinī
GSP30partrvpu:556_1: brāhmyādevatācakrasya vīryabhūtā nikhilākṣanāḍicakrasya madhyamadhyamarupā jananasthānakarṇikā liṅgātmā asti /
GSP30partrvpu:557: tatraiva ca kule bhavā kularūpā kaulikī /
GSP30partrvpu:558: yad vā kule bhavam akulātma kaulam /
GSP30partrvpu:559: tad yasyām antas tādātmyenāsti sā kaulikī /
GSP30partrvpu:560: kulaṃ hy akulaprakāśarūḍham eva tathā bhavati / yad uktam
GSP30partrvpu:564: Q: tad ākramya balaṃ mantrāḥ sarvajñabalaśālinaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:568: tan me kathaya ity api paṭhanti śrīsomānandapādā vyācakṣate ca tat tasmād iti /
GSP30partrvpu:569: yad vā tat kathaya yena tṛptiṃ paramānandamayīṃ labhe paramādvayanirvṛtisvātantryarasībhavāmīti samanvayaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:571: aham ity anena sarvapramātṛjīvanarūpam eva satataṃ parāmṛśyate /
GSP30partrvpu:572: tac caivam abhihitasvarūpopadeśena pratyabhijñāya nijam īśvararūpaṃ paripūrṇabhāvātmikāṃ tṛptiṃ vindatīti prāk prakaṭitam eva /
GSP30partrvpu:577: Q: hṛdy ayo gamanaṃ jñānam [Parātriṃśikāvivṛti of Somānanda]
GSP30partrvpu:579: iti śivarasaṃ pātuṃ yeṣāṃ pipāsati mānasaṃ satatam aśivadhvaṃse sattāṃ śivena niveśitām /
GSP30partrvpu:580: hṛdayagaganagranthiṃ teṣāṃ vidārāyituṃ haṭhād abhinava imāṃ praśnavyākhyāṃ vyadhāt trikatattvagām //
GSP30partrvpu:589: kevalam atra śaktimatprādhānyaṃ saṃhārarūpeṇa maha ity evaṃrūpam ity uktaṃ prāk sphuṭībhaviṣyati cāgrata eva /
GSP30partrvpu:613: śṛṇu devi mahābhage uttarasyāpy anuttaram // ParTri_3 //
GSP30partrvpu:614: yad ayaṃ kauliko vidhir mama hṛdvyomny avasthitaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:615: kathayāmi na saṃdehaḥ sadyaḥ kaulikasiddhidam // ParTri_4 //
GSP30partrvpu:618: mahān bhāgo yasyā yā bhajyamānā uktavakṣyamāṇopadeśānuśīlanena sevyamānā pārameśvaryākhyamahābaladā bhavatīti /
GSP30partrvpu:619: mahat paramamahadrūpatayā prasiddho 'nāśritaśivarūpaḥ sa yasyā bhāga aṃśaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:621: mahān buddhyādis tattvaviśeṣo bhāgo vibhāgaḥ kalāpekṣi rūpaṃ yasyāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:622: pārameśvarī hi saṃvidekaghanaśaktiḥ svasvātantryopakalpitabhinnajñeyakāryapratiṣṭhāpadatve buddhir ity ucyate /
GSP30partrvpu:625: Q: sā buddhir yat punaḥ sūkṣmaṃ sarvadikkam avasthitam /
GSP30partrvpu:626: Q: jñānaṃ bodhamayaṃ tasya śivasya sahajaṃ sadā // [Śivadṛṣṭi 1.2627]
GSP30partrvpu:627: iti / bhāgo bhedaḥ sa yatrāstīti matvarthīyākārapratyayāntena bhāgaśabdena vibhaktaṃ rūpam ucyate /
GSP30partrvpu:628_0: vibhakte ca vapuṣi paricchedo 'nyonyavyavacchedenaiva bhavatīti prasādātmakaviṣayaniścayo
GSP30partrvpu:628_1: buddhāv upajāyamāno 'pararamyāramyādiviśvavartino bhāvān aspṛśann eva pratyuta tān
GSP30partrvpu:629: sukhavṛttibuddher dharmaiśvaryādirūpatvāt sattvātmako guṇaniḥṣyanda iti gīyate /
GSP30partrvpu:630: yadi tu tatrāpi antastamām anupraviśyate tat taddvāreṇaiva tanmūlavartini paramānandadhāmni bhaved eva satatam udayaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:631: ata eva mahasya sarvato 'khaṇḍitaparipūrṇanirargalanirapekṣasvātantryajagadānandamayasya ā īṣad bhāgāḥ sukhalakṣaṇā aṃśāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:632: yato yat yat kila sukhaṃ tanmahānandanirvṛtiparamadhāmni visargaśaktāv anupraveśāt tathā 'cetyamānatayā kiyadrūpatāṃ prāptam
GSP30partrvpu:638: Q: trailokye 'py atra yo yāvān ānandaḥ kaścid īkṣyate /
GSP30partrvpu:639: Q: sa bindur yasya taṃ vande devam ānandasāgaram // [StaCiMa 61]
GSP30partrvpu:640: iti prāṅnayena yad uktaṃ maha iti rūpaṃ tad eva bhajanīyaṃ yasyāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:641: parameśvarasya hi svacamatkārabṛṃhitaṃ yad aham iti tad eva śāktaṃ vapuḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:642: tad eva ca parābhaṭṭārikārūpam ity ucyate /
GSP30partrvpu:643: ata eva saiva ca parameśvarī sarvaṃ śṛṇoti /
GSP30partrvpu:644: śravaṇākhyayā sattayā tiṣṭhantī śravaṇasaṃpuṭasphuṭakramikasvaspandamayavarṇarāśiniṣṭham aikātmyāpād anarūpasaṃkalanānusaṃdhānākhyaṃ svātantryam /
GSP30partrvpu:645: tena hi vinā kalakalalīnaśabdaviśeṣaṃ śṛṇvann api na śṛṇomīti vyavaharati pramātā /
GSP30partrvpu:646: kalakalamātraviṣayam eva tu saṃkalanam iti tatraiva śrutam iti vyavahāraḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:647: vastutas tu sa kalakaladhvaniḥ śrotrākāśa anupraviśan varṇān anupraveśayan tathā bhavet tadvarṇātiriktasya kalakalasyaivābhāvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:651: sarvathā ta eva varṇās tena sphuṭarūpeṇa saṃkalanām agacchantaḥ kalakalaśabdavācyāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:652: tatsaṃkalanāvadhānodyuktasya bhaved eva kiyanmātrasphuṭopalambha iti saṃkalanam evātropayogi /
GSP30partrvpu:653: saṃkalanaṃ ca bhagavatī saiva parā parameśvarī karoti / yad uktam
GSP30partrvpu:655: ityādi / vastuto hi śṛṇoti paśyati vakti gṛhṇātītyādi bhagavatyā eva rūpam / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:656: Q: yena rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaśabdau ca maithunam /
GSP30partrvpu:657: Q: etenaiva vijānāti kim atra pariśiṣyate //
GSP30partrvpu:664: tathā hi śrīparameśvara eva śrīsvacchandaśāstre japavibhāganirṇayāvasara evam eva nirūpitavān
GSP30partrvpu:665: Q: ātmanā śrūyate yas tu sa upāṃśur iti smṛtaḥ / [SvaTa 2.146]
GSP30partrvpu:666: atra hi madhyamāpade ātmaiva saṃśṛṇute nāpara ity uktam /
GSP30partrvpu:667: sthānādiprayatnasphuṭatāyāṃ dantauṣṭhapuṭādisaṃyogavibhāgenātinibhṛtam api śabdoccāre nikaṭataravartiparaśravaṇam api syād iti saśabdatāpāttir eva /
GSP30partrvpu:668: Q: paraiḥ saṃśrūyate yas tu saśabdo'sau prakīrtitaḥ / [SvaTa 2.247]
GSP30partrvpu:669: ity uktaṃ / yataḥ na cātra nikaṭādiviśeṣaḥ kaścid iti /
GSP30partrvpu:670: parapramātṛdarśanamātragocarajihvoṣṭhapuṭādisaṃyoge tu yady apy ātmana eva śravaṇaṃ syān na parasya tathāpi madhyamāpadam evaitat saṃpadyate varṇasya bahirātmalābhābhāvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:672: na ca tatra vāyvabhighāto bāhyatāpattiparyantaḥ syāt /
GSP30partrvpu:673: oṣṭhādicalanam api na tatra varṇāṃśe 'nupraviśed api tu svātmaniṣṭham eva tātkālikaṃ tat syāt /
GSP30partrvpu:674: tātkālikeṅgitanimiṣitakaravyāpārādisthānīye sphuṭasthānakaraṇaprayatnayoge tu varṇaniṣpattāv api yadi nāma dhvanīnāṃ tāratamyena tāramandrādivibhāge dūrādūrādiśravaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP30partrvpu:675: sarvathā paraiḥ śrūyata iti vaikharīpadam evaitad ity alaṃ prasaktānuprasaktyā /
GSP30partrvpu:679: tatra yat kevalaṃ svātmany avasthitaṃ tat kevalaṃ jaḍarūpayogi mukhyatayā narātmakaṃ ghaṭas tiṣṭhatītivat /
GSP30partrvpu:681: yat punar idam ity api bhāsamānaṃ yadāmantryamāṇatayā āmantrakāhaṃbhāvasamacchāditatadbhinnedaṃbhāvaṃ yuṣmacchabdavyapadeśyaṃ tac chāktaṃ rūpaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhasīti /
GSP30partrvpu:682: atra hy eṣa eva yuṣmacchabdārtho āmantraṇatattvaṃ ca /
GSP30partrvpu:686_0: tathā hi yathāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi tathaiva ayam apīti tasyāpy asmadrūpāvacchinnāhaṃbhāvacamatkārasvātantryam
GSP30partrvpu:688: sarvathā punar avicchinnacamatkāranirapekṣasvātantryāhaṃvimarśe ahaṃ tiṣṭhāmīti parābhaṭṭārikodayo yatrottamatvaṃ puruṣasya / yad uktam
GSP30partrvpu:689: Q: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:690: Q: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:692: iti / atra kṣarākṣararūpād ubhayato 'pi hy uttamatvam asmīty asmadarthenoktam /
GSP30partrvpu:693: na hy atra sarvatra aham iti parimitaṃ śarīrady apadiśyate tasya pratyakṣeṇaiva tādrūpyavirodhāt /
GSP30partrvpu:694: tad evam īdṛśaṃ svayaṃprathātmakaṃ śivātmakaṃ rūpam /
GSP30partrvpu:695: ata eva bodhasyāsya svasaṃvitprathātmakasya kiṃcin nonaṃ nāpy adhikaṃ tasyāprakāśarūpasya cinmaye ananupraveśāt,
GSP30partrvpu:696: tadapekṣayā ca mādhyasthyam api na kiṃcid ity upacayāpacayamadhyasthānīyedantānirdeśyabhāvalabdhapratiṣṭhāne na prabhavanti tadbodhāvicchedarūpā asmadarthāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:700: tathā hi svasvātantryopakalpitabhedāvabhāsy anantaśarīrādy ekatayaiva vimṛśed āvāṃ
GSP30partrvpu:702: upacayādyās tu dehagatā upacaritum api na śakyāḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:704: sarvaṃ hi sarvātmakam iti narātmāno jaḍā api tyaktatatpūrvarūpāḥ śāktaśaivarūpabhājo bhavanti,
GSP30partrvpu:710: śāktam api yuṣmadartharūpam api narātmakatāṃ bhajata eva śaktarūpam ujjhitvā tvaṃ gatabhayadhairyaśaktir ity anāmantraṇayogenāpi pratipatteḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:711: bhavān ity anena pādā gurava ityādipratyayaviśeṣaiś cāparāvasthocitanarātmakaprathamapuruṣaviṣayatayāpi pratītisadbhāvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:716: vayasye dayite śarīracittattvam evāhaṃ bhavāmīti pratyayāt /
GSP30partrvpu:717: śivasvarūpam api cojjhitacidrūpam iva naraśaktyātmakaṃ vapur āviśaty eva /
GSP30partrvpu:721: aho mahyam ityādau hy aham iti guṇīkṛtam avicchinnaṃ svātantryam /
GSP30partrvpu:722: mukhyatayā tu vicchinnaivedantā pratīyate yatra bhagavatyā aparāyā udayaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:724: kiṃ tu pūrvaṃ pūrvam avyabhicaritam uttaratra /
GSP30partrvpu:725: tena nararūpaṃ sphuṭayaiva pratipattyā śāktaśāṃbhavadhuram āroḍhuṃ śaknuyād eva /
GSP30partrvpu:727: atyaktanijanijarūpatayā tryātmakatvād ekadvibahurūpabhāgitvam eti pratyekam etat trikam / uktaṃ hi
GSP30partrvpu:728: Q: ekaṃ vastu dvidhā bhūtaṃ dvidhā bhūtam anekadhā /
GSP30partrvpu:730: iti / ekātmakatve hy apratiyogitvāc chivatā pratiyogisaṃbhave śāktatvam anekatāyāṃ bheda eva narātmabhāva ekasyaiva /
GSP30partrvpu:731: ghaṭaḥ ghaṭapaṭau ghaṭāḥ ghaṭapaṭapāṣāṇā ity api hi tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhataḥ tiṣṭhantīti caikyenaiva kriyāśaktisphuritam evaitat / yathoktaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:732: Q: anekam ekadhā kṛtvā ko na mucyeta bandhanāt /
GSP30partrvpu:734: iti / ata eva naraśaktiśivātmanāṃ yugapad ekatra parāmarśe uttarottarasvarūpānupraveśa eva tasyaiva vastutas tatparamārtharūpatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:736: sa ca tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca tiṣṭhāma iti pratītikrama evākṛtakasaṃskārasāraḥ śābdikair lakṣaṇair anugamyate /
GSP30partrvpu:737: tathā ca nijabhāṣāpadeṣv api saṃskārasya yatra nāmāpi na avaśiṣyate bauddhāndradraviḍādiṣu tatrāpy ayam eva vācanikaḥ kramaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:741: vacanakramaś ca hārdīm eva pratītiṃ mūlato 'nusaran tatpratītirasarūpatayā pratīter apy evaṃrūpatvam avagamayet /
GSP30partrvpu:745: Q: na tair vinā bhavec chabdo nārtho nāpi citer gatiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:747: Q: evaṃ sarvāṇusaṃghātam adhiṣṭhāya yathā sthitā /
GSP30partrvpu:748: Q: tathā te kathitā śambhoḥ śaktir ekaiva śāṃkarī //
GSP30partrvpu:751: Q: naraśaktiśivāveśi viśvam etat sadā sthitam /
GSP30partrvpu:752: Q: vyavahāre krimīṇāṃ ca sarvajñānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:753: iti / tad eva naraśaktiśivātmakaṃ sphuṭapratipattisaṃpradāyopadeśena darśitam /
GSP30partrvpu:754_0: naraḥ śaktiḥ śiva iti tu sarvaṃsahaḥ pratipattikramaḥ parameśvarecchāsvātantryasṛṣṭa
GSP30partrvpu:758: pratika{uttarasyāpi} iti yad uktaṃ katham anuttaram iti tatra prativacanam /
GSP30partrvpu:761: hy uttaram apy anuttaratādātmyenaiva bhavet nānyathā /
GSP30partrvpu:764: uttaraṃ rūpaṃ hy anādṛtatadbhāvam anuttararūpam eva /
GSP30partrvpu:765: bhedo hy ayam uttararūpo nitarām evābhedabhuvam adhiśayya tathā bhavet / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:766: Q: paravyavasthāpi pare yāvan nātmīkṛtaḥ paraḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:767: Q: tāvan na śakyate kartuṃ yato buddhaḥ paraḥ paraḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:772: tathottarasyāpi granthabhāgasyānuttaraṃ tenāpi uttarītuṃ na śakyate /
GSP30partrvpu:773: paśyantyā api parābhaṭṭārikāyāḥ prathamaprasaratvād uttarasyāpi ca madīyasyaitad evānuttaraṃ paramārthaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:775: kiṃ tad ity āha yataḥ syād ayaṃ kauliko vidhiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:776: kaulikaḥ kulākulātmā prāg vyākhyātaḥ vidhīyamānatvād vidhir mahāsṛṣṭirūpo garbhīkṛtānantasṛṣṭyādikoṭiśato yasmāt prasṛta etad eva tad anuttaram / yad uktam
GSP30partrvpu:778: iti / tathā hīdaṃ viśvaṃ ciccittaprāṇadehasukhaduḥkhendriyabhūtaghaṭādimayam ekasyāṃ parasyāṃ parameśvaryāṃ bhairavasaṃvidy avibhāgenaiva bodhātmakena rūpeṇāste /
GSP30partrvpu:779: yady api bodhātmakaṃ rūpaṃ nāstameti jātucid api tadastamaye aprakāśamānatāpatteḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:782_0: tatra ca yady eṣām avasthitir na syāt tat prathamānusaṃdhānādikam evākṣapreraṇopayogy
GSP30partrvpu:782_1: api na bhaved iti samucitānuditedantākam ahaṃparāmarśamātrābhinnam eva bhāvajātaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:784: tathā yad yatra spaṣṭaḥ sann ayaṃ vidhiḥ kaulikaḥ sthito viśrāntiṃ prāptaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:785: sarvam idaṃ hi ṣaṭtriṃśadātma tataḥ sāmānyaspandasaṃvidātmanaḥ śaktimataḥ paraśaktipradhānāc
GSP30partrvpu:786: chivāt svaśaktyā sṛṣṭam api sat tatraiva bhairavaviśeṣaspandātmani śaktipradhāne svasvarūpe viśrāmyet /
GSP30partrvpu:787: tad eva svasvabhāvaniṣṭhitatvaṃ bhāvānām / yad uktaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:789_0: iti / tad etad śivaśaktyātmaiva sāmānyaviśeṣarūpam ekātmakam api parameśvareṇaivopadeśopāyapraveśāya
GSP30partrvpu:789_1: pṛthakkṛtya nirūpyamāṇaṃ vastutaḥ punar ekam eva svatantracinmayam aham ity aiśvaryaśaktisāram anuttaram /
GSP30partrvpu:792: mameti yad etad dhṛdayaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhādhāma /
GSP30partrvpu:793: nīlādīnāṃ hy antataḥ krimiparyantaṃ cidaṃśāniviṣṭānāṃ na kiṃcit nīlādirūpam iti pramātur eva yat
GSP30partrvpu:801: tasya mamety asya nīlādyanantasarvabhāvahṛdayasya yad vyoma yatra tat mamakārātmakaṃ viśvaṃ samyag dhṛtam /
GSP30partrvpu:802: ata eva tyaktabhinnanijarūpatayā śūnyarūpaṃ vyoma yatra /
GSP30partrvpu:803_0: tathā mamety asya bhinnābhinnarūpaparāparasaṃvidātmano yad dhṛdayaṃ paryantapratiṣṭhādhāma
GSP30partrvpu:803_1: aham iti tasyāpi vyoma saṃhārarūpakalanena maha iti narātmakaṃ līnaṃ bindvātmaśaktau ma iti,
GSP30partrvpu:804: kuṇḍalinīhakalārūpāyāṃ praviśya paripūrṇanirargalacamatkāre sarvāvicchinne a ity anupraviṣṭaṃ tathā bhavati /
GSP30partrvpu:806: evaṃ yata idaṃ praṣṛtaṃ yatra ca viśrāntaṃ tad eva nityam anāvṛtasvabhāvaṃ svayaṃ prathamānam anapahnavanīyam anuttaram / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:807: Q: yatra sthitam idaṃ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ yasmāc ca nirgatam /
GSP30partrvpu:810: iti / āvarakatvena nirodhakābhimato 'pi hi tadāvaraṇādisvātantryeṇa prakāśamāno dṛkkriyātmaka eva parameśvaraḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:811: yad ity ayaṃ nipātaḥ sarvavibhaktyarthavṛttir aparavākyīyasaṃbandhaucityād viśeṣe sthāsnur atra pañcamyarthe saptamyarthe ca vartate /
GSP30partrvpu:812: ayaṃ hy āñjasyena artho yad ayaṃ kaulikaḥ sṛṣṭiprasaraḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:813: yac ca mama hṛdvyomny avasthitas tad evānuttaram /
GSP30partrvpu:814: evaṃ tasyaiva prasaraviśrāntyubhayasthānatvaṃ nirūpya prasarakramasvarūpaṃ kriyāśaktispandavisargaṃ nirūpayati
GSP30partrvpu:816_0: ityādi / tad eva hi rūpam ahaṃ parānuttarātma parāparādimayapaśyantyādiprasaraparipāṭyā
GSP30partrvpu:818: iti / prathamaparyantabhuvi parābhaṭṭārikātmani tatprasarātmani ca parāparādevatāvapuṣy anuttaradhruvapadavijṛmbhaiva /
GSP30partrvpu:819: tad āhur nijavivṛtau śrīsomānandapādāḥ kathayāmity uccārayāmy utkalikāta iti /
GSP30partrvpu:826: ya eva ca parameśvaro bhairavātmākulānuttaradhruvadhāmatayoktas tad evedaṃ sarvaṃ sat kaulikavidhirūpam /
GSP30partrvpu:827: na hi prakāśavimarśaśuddhabhairavasvarūpātireki kiṃcit bhāvānāṃ sattvam /
GSP30partrvpu:828: sattāsaṃbandhārthakriyākāritvādīnām api sattāhetutāparābhimatānām api sattā'yoge tathātvānupapatteḥ sattvāntarārthākriyāntarayoge cānavasthāpatteḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:829: prathamata eva tathā vimarśajīvitaprakāśamayatvam eva sattvaṃ,
GSP30partrvpu:830: tac ca svātantryavimarśasārāhaṃbhāvabharitam iti bhairavarūpam eva /
GSP30partrvpu:831: yad vā sati sadrūpe yasyati yatnaṃ karoti kriyāśaktiprāṇatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:833: sad yad iti kecit guravaḥ paṭhanti /
GSP30partrvpu:835: Q: prakāśamānābhāsaiva yad bhūtis tat sad eva hi /
GSP30partrvpu:839: Q: yat sat tat paramārtho hi paramārthas tataḥ śivaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:848: tatra hi paramārthapramātari sakalaṃ kulākulādi tathā bhavati /
GSP30partrvpu:849: yatra pratīyamānaṃ sarvaṃ tathātvadārḍhyaṃ bhajate / tad uktam
GSP30partrvpu:852: Q: vedāc chaivaṃ tato vāmaṃ tato dakṣaṃ tataḥ kulam /
GSP30partrvpu:853: Q: tato mataṃ tataś cāpi trikaṃ sarvottamaṃ param //
GSP30partrvpu:856: Q: saṃskāryo bhairave so 'pi kule kaule trike 'pi saḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:864: Q: kramād bhairavatantreṣu punaḥ saṃskāram arhati // [Sarvācāra]
GSP30partrvpu:866: yathoktam evaṃ yat sarvalokavedasiddhāntavāmadakṣiṇakulamatabhūmiṣu paramārthapramātṛ iti / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:867: Q: yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:870: Q: kiṃ bahunā sarvam evānuttaram anuttaratvād
GSP30partrvpu:873: iti / īdṛg vyākhyānaṃ tyaktvā yad anyair vyākhyātaṃ tatpradarśanaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GSP30partrvpu:874: yady api padavākyasaṃskāravihīnaiḥ saha vrīḍāvahā goṣṭhī kṛtābhavati tathāpi sacetaso 'nuttaram avabodhayituṃ tad ekavāraṃ tāval likhyate /
GSP30partrvpu:876: pratika{anuttaram} ityādinā sārdhena ślokena śivaviṣayaḥ praśnaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:881: pratika{uttarasyāpy anuttaram} iti tatrārtha uttaraṃ ca śṛṇv anuttaraṃ ceti /
GSP30partrvpu:882: atra yady eṣā trikārthābhiprāyeṇa vyākhyā tan naraviṣayatṛtīyapraśnaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:883: atha tu yāmalābhiprāyeṇa tatrāpi na dve vastunī śivaśaktyātmake yāmalam ucyate yena pṛthak praśnaviṣayatopapattiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:887: tathāhi keṣucid vṛddhapustakeṣv īdṛk ślokāntaraṃ dṛśyate
GSP30partrvpu:888: Q: śrutaṃ deva mahājñānaṃ trikākhyaṃ parameśvara /
GSP30partrvpu:889: Q: uttaraṃ ca tathā jñānaṃ tvatprasādāvadhāritam //
GSP30partrvpu:890: iti / tasmāt śrīsomānandapādanirūpitavyākhyānusāreṇaiva yad guravaḥ samādikṣan tad eva sarvasya karoti śivam /
GSP30partrvpu:898: evaṃ yato 'yaṃ kauliko vidhiḥ prabhavati yatra ca pratiṣṭhāpadavīṃ bhajate yanmayaṃ cedaṃ kaulikaṃ tad evānuttaraṃ ity uktam /
GSP30partrvpu:899: tatra kas tāvat kauliko vidhiḥ kathaṃ cāsya prasaro 'nuttarāt kathaṃ cātraivāsya pratiṣṭhā kathaṃ cānuttaraikarūpatvam ?
GSP30partrvpu:900: yac coktam uttarasyāpy anuttaram iti tat sarvaṃ yuktyāgamasvasaṃvedananiṣkarṣaṇatattvāvabodhāvāptavimarśanipuṇān śiṣyān prati vitatya nirṇinīṣur bhagavān prastauti granthāntaram /
GSP30partrvpu:906: atas tāvanmātra eva dṛḍhapratipattipavitrīkṛtair viśramaṇīyam ity udbhujāḥ phūtkurmaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:907: tad anuttaraparabhairavapadavimaladarpaṇāntarniviṣṭakaulikapadapraviviktaye granthāntaram avatarati ity uktam / tad yathā
GSP30partrvpu:913: kramāt kādiṣu vargeṣu makārānteṣu suvrate // ParTri_6 //
GSP30partrvpu:917: amūlā tatkramā jñeyā kṣāntā sṛṣṭir udāhṛtā /
GSP30partrvpu:918: sarveṣāṃ caiva mantrāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ ca yaśasvini // ParTri_8 //
GSP30partrvpu:921: tatrākulam anuttaram eva kaulikaṃ sṛṣṭirūpam iti nirṇīyate /
GSP30partrvpu:922: atha tat sṛṣṭir iti saṃbandhas tad evānuttaraṃ padaṃ sṛṣṭir ity arthaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:923_0: yady api ca sṛṣṭāv api prāktananayena kālāpekṣi paurvāparyaṃ na syāt tathāpy upadeśyopadeśabhāvalakṣaṇo
GSP30partrvpu:923_1: bhedo yāvat svātmani svātantryāt parameśvareṇa bhāsyate tāvat paurvāparyam apīti
GSP30partrvpu:928: yāvat / na tu praśnapratijñābhyām ānantaryam athaśabdenoktam ekapraghaṭṭakagatasajātīyaprameyāpekṣakramatātparyapratītipravaṇatvād
GSP30partrvpu:929: asya / anyathā tūṣṇīṃbhāvāder anantaram idam ity api sarvatra tatprayogāvakāśaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:931: iti cen na kaś cid ṛte
GSP30partrvpu:934: Q: akāraḥ śiva ity uktas thakāraḥ śaktir ucyate /
GSP30partrvpu:935_0: ity āgamapradarśanenātha ity etāvad evānuttaram iti vyācacakṣire thakārasamavyāptikatābhiprāyeṇa
GSP30partrvpu:937: tādṛśasyāgamasya yato na sākṣād vayam abhijñāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:938: tais tu tathāvidhāgamasākṣātkāribhir anekayuktiśatasahiṣṇutā sūtragranthasya sūtritaiva /
GSP30partrvpu:939: dhūlibhedapradarśanam api tenaivābhiprāyeṇa tair itaś cāmutaś ca vitatam /
GSP30partrvpu:940: vayaṃ tu tacchāsanapavitritās tadgranthagranthinirdalanābhilaṣitasvātmapavitrabhāvās tair nirṇīteṣv artheṣūdāsīnā eva /
GSP30partrvpu:941: dhūlibhedādinā ca kalpitasāmayikalipyapekṣaṇam api bhaved api kasya cit upāyāya,
GSP30partrvpu:942: na tu tat sakaladeśakālagataśiṣyaviṣayam iti nāsmabhir vitatya vipañcitam
GSP30partrvpu:943: / etadanubhavayuktyanupraviṣṭānāṃ ca tad akāryakaraṃ svakalpanābhiś ca sukaram avyavasthitaṃ ca,
GSP30partrvpu:944: anyeṣāṃ caitadupadeśānabhijñānāṃ tadupadeśanam apy akiṃcitkaram ity alam anena prakṛtavighnavidhāyinā /
GSP30partrvpu:946: ``a'' ādyo yeṣāṃ svarāṇāṃ yadi vā thakāreṇa sukhoccāraṇārthena saha athādyo yeṣām iti ādyaśabdaś cātra na vyavasthāmātre nāpi sāmīpyādau,
GSP30partrvpu:948: tathā hy amīyāṃ varṇānāṃ parāvāgbhūmir iyam iha nirṇīyate yatraivaiṣām asāmayikaṃ nityam akṛtrimaṃ saṃvinmayam eva rūpam /
GSP30partrvpu:953: sā ca parameśvarī parābhaṭṭārikā tathāvidhaniratiśayābhedabhāginy api paśyantyādikāḥ parāparābhaṭṭārikādisphārarūpā antaḥkṛtya tattadanantavaicitryagarbhamayī /
GSP30partrvpu:954: na hi tatra yan nāsti tat kvāpy astīti nyāyyam /
GSP30partrvpu:955: parāmṛśata ca prathamāṃ pratibhābhidhānāṃ saṃkocakalaṅkakāluṣyaleśaśūnyāṃ bhagavatīṃ saṃvidam /
GSP30partrvpu:956_0: tathāhi yat kiṃcic caram acaraṃ ca tat pāramārthikenānapāyinā rūpeṇa vīryamātrasārātmanā
GSP30partrvpu:959: savicikitsair api pratibhātakiyanmātravastudattasaṃkocā na tv akṛtrimā /
GSP30partrvpu:962: iti / evam eṣa svaprakāśaikarūpo 'py artho yuktyā pradarśyate /
GSP30partrvpu:965: yat tu tadviruddharūpanīlapītādyābhāsāvibhaktaṃ na bhavati tattadanantasvasāmarthyodbhūtanīlapītādyābhāsavikalpapūrvabhāgy api na bhavati,
GSP30partrvpu:969: eveti / ubhayoś ca jñānayor antarālam anapahvanīyāṃ jñānayor bhedād eva /
GSP30partrvpu:971: anyathā tenaiva saṃvitsaṃskārocchede smaraṇādyanusaṃdhānādyayoga iti pratibhākhyasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvavādinaḥ praty avivāda eveti nāsiddhiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:983: saṃvidaś ca praṅnyāyena kālādiparicchedābhāva iti ekaiva sā pārameśvarī pratibhā asmaduktimāhātmyakalpitā evaṃvidhaparicchinnasvabhāvāpi sarvātmaiva /
GSP30partrvpu:985: tathā ca vivekakuśalair ālayavijñānam evam evopagatam /
GSP30partrvpu:986: sasaṃvādatvaṃ ca tadanantarabhāvināṃ vikalpānāṃ darśitam eveti nāsiddho hetuḥ sādhyadharmiṇi,
GSP30partrvpu:989: na ca tato 'sya vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdheti na viruddho nānaikāntiko na saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:990: dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇy api citrajñānādau hetor evam evāsiddhatādidoṣā parihṛtā bhavanty eva /
GSP30partrvpu:991: hetudoṣeṣu tu parihṛteṣu dṛṣṭāntādidoṣā niravakāśā eva ityādi bahu nirṇītakalpam aparair eveti kiṃ tadanubhāṣaṇakleśena /
GSP30partrvpu:994: tasyāṃ pralīnavapuṣaḥ paraśaktibhāsi glānir ghaṭeta kim abhāvavaśopakḷptā //
GSP30partrvpu:995: śarīraprāṇādau paradhanasukhāsvādapaṭalam anālokya svasmin spṛśati hṛdaye glānim asamām /
GSP30partrvpu:996: praviṣṭā ced antar nikhilajagatīsūtisarasā parā devī hanta pravilasatu pūrṇaṃ havir iva //
GSP30partrvpu:998: Q: glānir vilumpikā dehe tasyāś cājñānataḥ sṛtiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:999: Q: tad unmeṣaviluptaṃ cet kutaḥ sā syād ahetukā // SpaKā_3.8 //
GSP30partrvpu:1007: Q: unmeṣaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ svayaṃ tam upalakṣayet // SpaKā_3.9 //
GSP30partrvpu:1009: Q: māyīyakārmamalamūlam uśanti tāvad ajñānanāmamalam āṇavam eva bhadrāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1010: Q: bījaṃ tad eva bhavajīrṇataroḥ parasmin saṃvinniśātadahane dahate kṣaṇena //
GSP30partrvpu:1015: iti / evam eva ca vyākhyātam adaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1016: anyathā glāner vilopakatvam asyāś cājñānāt saraṇam ajñānasya conmeṣeṇa vilopa iti kiṃ kena saṃśliṣṭam iti nṛpanirūpaṇaprāyam eva bhavet /
GSP30partrvpu:1018_4: athādyā ityādinā granthena niḥśeṣaṃ bhagavatā nirṇīyata iti sthitam /
GSP30partrvpu:1032: tathāhi dhriyante svātmany eva sarve bhāvāḥ prakāśātmani paramaparipūrṇe pade bhairavātmani sarvātmani /
GSP30partrvpu:1038: iti / evaṃ svātmany eva prabhāsvare prakāśanena dhriyamāṇān bhāvān dhārayati svayam aprakāśībhāvena jaḍatāsvabhāvedaṃbhāvāspadatāprāpaṇena prakāśayati parameśvara eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1040: tad iyaṃ bhagavatsadāśiveśadaśā śuddhavidyāmayī ekena ṇicā dhvanitā /
GSP30partrvpu:1041: tatrāpi ca yad idantāyā ahantayācchādanaṃ tadācchādanīyedantopapattāv upapadyate,
GSP30partrvpu:1042_0: na ca śuddhaparameśvaracinmayarūpāpekṣaṃ bhinnaprathātmakam idantākhyaṃ rūpam upapadyata
GSP30partrvpu:1042_1: ity ācchādanīyānupapattau tadvaśena tadācchādakatāpy ahaṃbhāvasya nopapanneti tathāvidheśvarabodhānupapattiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1043: tadanupapattau ca na kiṃcid bhāseta kāraṇābhavād ity uktam asakṛt /
GSP30partrvpu:1044: bhāsate cedaṃ tadbhāsāvyatirekarahitam api parameśvaraśaktita eva bahiḥ prathate kāraṇāntarāsaṃbhavāt
GSP30partrvpu:1046_0: tad evaṃ svātmarūpaṃ jagad bhedena bhāsamānaṃ prakāśātmany eva ahamātmani bhāsate
GSP30partrvpu:1046_1: sāmānādhikaraṇyenetīyatā etāvad avaśyam evākṣiptaṃ yathā īśvara eva kasyāpi veditur
GSP30partrvpu:1046_2: bhinnān vedyān ahantayā paśyati yaś cāsau ko 'pi vedayitā so 'pi bhāsanāt svātmamaya
GSP30partrvpu:1046_3: eveti svātmani tathāvidhāḥ śaktīr adhiśete yābhir asau tadaiva bhinnavedyavedakībhāvam upāśnuvīta /
GSP30partrvpu:1047: rāgādibhir eva ca tathāvidhatvam asyeti rāgādaya eva dhriyamānān bhāvān uktanyāyena dhārayantam īśvaraṃ prati prayojakatāṃ gacchanti /
GSP30partrvpu:1048: atas tasyaiva puṃstvavyapadeśakāraṇaikabhūtā dvitīye ṇici utpanne dhāraṇaśabdavācyāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1053: dhriyamāṇatayā prakāśamānasyaiva hi dhāryamāṇatā prakāśanāsaṃjñā upapadyate yataḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1055: Q: preryo 'pi sa bhaved yasya śaktatā nāma vidyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1057: Q: apravṛttasya hi praiṣe pracchāder loḍ vidhīyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1058: Q: pravṛttasya yadā praiṣas tadā sa viṣayo ṇicaḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:1059: iti / tad evaṃ dhāraṇaśabdenāparaśāstreṣu kañcukanāmadheyaprasiddhāny eva tattvānīha nirūpitāni /
GSP30partrvpu:1061: Q: dhārayanti paśoḥ pāśān bhāvān svātmamayāṃs tathā /
GSP30partrvpu:1063: iti / yat tu śrīsomānandapādair dhāraṇaśabdenāṅgāni nirūpitāni pakṣāntarāśrayaṇena tatra parapakṣasarvadṛśyatvaprathanam ātmany abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1065: Q: svapakṣān parapakṣāṃś ca niḥśeṣeṇa na veda yaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1066: Q: svayaṃ sa saṃśayāmbhodhau nimajjaṃs tārayet katham //
GSP30partrvpu:1068: tathā hi māyātattvasyopari vidyātattvādhaś ca avaśyaṃ tattvāntareṇa bhāvitavyaṃ yatra vijñānākalānāṃ sthitiḥ / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:1070: iti / tathā hi mahāmāyābhāve māyāpade pralayakevalānām avasthitiḥ vidyāpade ca vidyeśvarādīnām iti kim iva tad vijñānakevalāspadaṃ syāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1071: ata eva vidyāpadapracyutānām apy eṣāṃ bhedamayabhāvarāśigatabhinnavedyaprathānudayān māyīyābhidhānamalānullāse
GSP30partrvpu:1074: ta eva śuddhavidyāpadānugrahād bodhitā mantratadīśādibhāvabhāgino bhavantīti tatraivoktaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:1078: Q: vijñānakevalān aṣṭau bodhayām āsa pudgalān / [MVUT 1.19ab]
GSP30partrvpu:1082: keṣu cit tu śāstreṣu sā mahāmāyā bhedamalābhāvopacārād vidyātattvaśeṣatayaiva nirṇīyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1083: kvacit punar ajñānamalasadbhāvoparodhān māyātattyapucchatayā yathā keṣu cit śāstreṣu
GSP30partrvpu:1086: yathā vehaiva śrītrikāgameṣu niyatikālau na pṛthaṅ nirūpitau /
GSP30partrvpu:1087: atra mate vidyādyanāśritaśivāntaṃ brahmapañcakaṃ nirṇeṣyate caitat /
GSP30partrvpu:1088: eṣāṃ ca tattvānaṃ bṛhattvaṃ bṛṃhakatvaṃ ca prāyo bhedasamuttīrṇatvāt saṃsārasūtikartṛtvāc ca /
GSP30partrvpu:1089: evam etāni catustriṃśattattvāni prakriyātmanā sthitāny akāram eva ādirūpatayā bhajante /
GSP30partrvpu:1092: tato bhūtānītyādi yāvad ante śaktitattvam iti ko 'yaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārajñaptisthityavatārakramāṇāṃ madhyāt kramaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1093: sarvatra ca śrīmālinīvijayottarasiddhātantrasvacchandādiśāstreṣu kṣakārāt prabhṛty avargāntaṃ pārthivādīnāṃ śivāntānāṃ tattvānāṃ niveśa uktaḥ
GSP30partrvpu:1094: Q: ādyaṃ dhārikayā vyāptaṃ tatraikaṃ tattvam iṣyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1095: Q: ekam ekaṃ pṛthak kṣārṇaṃ padārṇam anuṣu smaret // [MVUT_2.50]
GSP30partrvpu:1096: ityādinā / tatraiva ca punar bhinnayonimālinībhaṭṭārikānusāreṇa phakārādīnām abhinnayonimātṛkāniveśāvāptatattvāntarasthitīnām api
GSP30partrvpu:1101: Q: niṣkale padam ekārṇaṃ tryarṇaikārṇadvayaṃ dvaye /
GSP30partrvpu:1105: iti parāparābhaṭṭārikānusāreṇa oṃkāraṃ śivatattvam aghore ity atra śaktitattvam ityādikrameṇa pārthivāditattvanirūpaṇā yojitā /
GSP30partrvpu:1107: Q: sārdhenāṇḍadvayaṃ vyāptam ekaikena pṛthag dvayam /
GSP30partrvpu:1108: Q: aparāyāḥ samākhyātā vyāptir eṣā vilomataḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:1113: Q: sārṇena tritayaṃ vyāptaṃ triśūlena caturthakam /
GSP30partrvpu:1114: Q: sarvātītaṃ visargeṇa parā vyāptir udāhṛtā //
GSP30partrvpu:1117: aparatantreṣv apy evam eva viparyastaprāyaṃ bahu bahuśo nirūpitam /
GSP30partrvpu:1118: tat punar iha sarvam evānyatheti paridṛśyata iti mahān ayam āgamavidaḥ svakaṭakakṣobha iva sarvavināśakaḥ samudbhūtaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1119: na ca sāṃketikam idaṃ yena puruṣecchāvaśopakalpitena rūpeṇa cānyathānyathā nirūpyamāṇam iha saṃgataṃ bhavet,
GSP30partrvpu:1124: sāṃketikatve hy anavasthitatvād apāramārthikatvāc ca śodhyaśodhakabhāvādyanupayogād anirūpaṇīyatvam eva syāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1126: / na hi saṃketo nāma anyaḥ kaś cid ṛte parameśvarecchātaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1127: prasiddho hi naḥ saṃketo bhagavadicchāprakalpitas tannāmākṣaralipyādigatāpyāyanādikarmavidhijanitatacchāntikādiphalasaṃpatter iti cet /
GSP30partrvpu:1128: tarhy ekenaiva saṃketena sarvavastusaṃpattau kiṃ saṃketāntarāśrayeṇa /
GSP30partrvpu:1129: tadāśrayaṇe vā svaśāstritaśāstrāntarīyalaukikapārṣadadaiśikaghanakṛtapratipuruṣaniyatādyanantasaṃketaniveśapūrvakaṃ tad api nirūpyam eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1131: etāvataiva kāryasiddhir ity api nirakṣarakukṣikuharair ucyamānaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ ca śobhata eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1135: avikalā bhagavadicchā na vicārapadavīm adhiśete iti ced alaṃ granthadhāraṇavācanavyākhyānavicāraṇādimithyāyāsena,
GSP30partrvpu:1140_0: na khalu pādaprasārikayaiva sukhaṃ sayānair bhuñjānaiś ca svayam avimṛśadbhiḥ svāpekṣatīvratarādiparameśvarānugrahotpannādhikādhikasūkṣmatamavimarśakuśaladhiṣaṇāpariśīlanaparāṅmukhair vā sthātavyam iti /
GSP30partrvpu:1141: tat sarvadā vimṛśyam idaṃ vartata iti etāvan na jahīmaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1142: tad atrāvadhārya sthīyatāṃ yāvat pariharāmaḥ sarvam idaṃ kiṃ cin na vastutaś codyajātaṃ parameśvaryāṃ parāvāgbhuvy anuttaradurghaṭakāritātmakanirapekṣasvātantryasārāyāṃ
GSP30partrvpu:1146: yat tāvad uktaṃ śivatattvaṃ tataḥ pṛthivītyādīti ko 'yaṃ krama iti /
GSP30partrvpu:1147: tan na kaś cit krama iti brūmaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1148: akramaṃ yad etat paraṃ pārameśvaraṃ vicitraṃ garbhīkṛtānantavaicitryaṃ svātantryaṃ trikārtharūpaṃ tad evaitat /
GSP30partrvpu:1149: tathā hi yeyam aparā parāparā parābhaṭṭārikā pārameśvarī bhairavīyā sattā sā sadāśivatattvānāśritaśaktitattvasyāpy uparivṛttis tadantasyāpy āsanapakṣīkṛtatvāt / tathā hi
GSP30partrvpu:1150: Q: īśvaraṃ ca mahāpretaṃ prahasantam acetanam /
GSP30partrvpu:1151: ity anena sadāśivāntam āsanaṃ nādāntapakṣaniviṣṭaṃ śrīpūrvaśāstropasaṃhṛtam
GSP30partrvpu:1156: tatrāpy aunmanasordhvakuṇḍalikāpadaparamadhāma sitakamalatrayarūpatayā nirūpitam ity etat paramāsanaṃ parāparyantatvād iti /
GSP30partrvpu:1161: tat paraṃ paśyantyākhyaṃ jñānaśakter eva paryantadhāma nādākhyarūpam atikramaṇīyatvenaiva sthitam /
GSP30partrvpu:1164: Q: vaiyākaraṇasādhūnāṃ sā paśyantī parā sthitiḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:1165: iti / pratyagātmani hi buddhiḥ paśyantī rudradevatā paraṃ sadāśivajñānaśaktāv eva anāśritaśivaśaktyātmani viśrāmyati /
GSP30partrvpu:1166: mano'haṃkārayor brahmaviṣṇudevatayor vaikharīmadhyamāpade patyor īśasadāśivakriyāśaktipadam eva parā pratiṣṭhābhūr iti tāvad āgamasiddhaṃ svasaṃvedanabṛṃhitaṃ ca /
GSP30partrvpu:1167: tat paśyantyupari parābhūmir bhagavatī yatra sarvam abhedenaiva bhāti ca vimṛśyate ca /
GSP30partrvpu:1168: yady api hi vidyāpade māyāpade 'py abhedena bhāsanā sthitāpi tatra vimarśo 'nyathā /
GSP30partrvpu:1169: vidyāpade hīdam iti pramātṛprameyajātam ekato 'hamātmani saṃkrāmet tadācchāditaṃ vimṛśyate
GSP30partrvpu:1171: iti / tad etat samāne cidātmany adhikaraṇe ubhayaṃ pratibimbitam abhedenaivāvabhāsamānaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam uktam / ata eva
GSP30partrvpu:1172: Q: īśvarāvasthāyāṃ parāparātmikāṃ daśāṃ bhāvā bhajante,
GSP30partrvpu:1175: iti yad īśvaratattvaṃ praty abhihitaṃ śrīmadutpaladevapādais tat pradarśitāgamaviparyāsaśaṅkāyuktam iti na mantavyam /
GSP30partrvpu:1176: mantramaheśādiṣu tu rūpaṃ bodhaikaparamārtham api aparabodhaikaparamārthād anyad
GSP30partrvpu:1177: Q: aham aham idaṃ punar idam eva
GSP30partrvpu:1178: iti saṃvit / vijñānākalānāṃ tu bodhaikaparamārthe 'pi rūpe
GSP30partrvpu:1180: iti saṃvidaprabodhād aham ity eva tatra prabuddham /
GSP30partrvpu:1181: pralayakevalinām idam aham ity aprabuddham eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1182_0: atra māyāpade ca tannirvikalpakatābhāsena yady apy asti tathāvidha eva prāṇabhūto
GSP30partrvpu:1191_0: tatra tu tathāvidhatve kāraṇāntarāsaṃvedanāt kalpyamāne 'pi ca kāraṇe punar api tathāvidhabodhāvinirbhāgamātraparyavasānat
GSP30partrvpu:1191_1: tasyaivāvikalpasaṃvidātmanas tathāsāmarthyaṃ tathāsāmarthyayogād eva ca tadanantavaicitryātmakatvam
GSP30partrvpu:1192: asyāṃ ca sattāyām aiśvaryam anapetaṃ yato vaikharyātmani evaṃ māyīye vedye 'pi vā madhyamāmaye dhāmni bhāsanātireky api saṃbhāvya evaṃ vimarśaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1193: atra tu parasaṃvidi yathaiva bhāsā tathaiva vyavahāramayo 'pi vimarśaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1194: tena jala iva jalaṃ jvālāyām iva jvālā sarvathābhedamayā eva bhāvā bhāsante,
GSP30partrvpu:1196: kevalaṃ yāvad eṣāpi parameśvarī upadeśāya nirūpyate tāvad adharasattākḷptā tathā bhavati /
GSP30partrvpu:1198: svataḥsiddham anādi prathamaṃ sarvataḥ caramaṃ ca sarvataś ca vartamānam iti kim aparaṃ tatrocyatām /
GSP30partrvpu:1199: tattvabhāvavikāsam ātmamayam ātmaikyenaiva svaprakāśaṃ prakāśayati tathaiva ca vimṛśaty anapetatathācamatkāratve 'pi /
GSP30partrvpu:1200: yac ca tat tathā vimarśanaṃ tad bhāvimāyīyānantasṛṣṭisaṃhāralakṣakoṭyarbudaparārdhasākṣātkāriṇi bhāsane bhavet tathārūpam eva bhavati /
GSP30partrvpu:1201_0: tathābhavac ca tad yadi sṛṣṭau prāthamikaṃ mādhyamikaṃ vā padaṃ bhāsanād vimṛśet
GSP30partrvpu:1203_0: etādṛśadhārārohaṇābhāve ca na kiṃ cit idaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇaṃ bhāseta iti na vrajatv apūrṇatā
GSP30partrvpu:1203_1: mā prathiṣṭha bhāvarāśir abhedakathā khaṇḍyatāṃ mā nirvākṣīd bhairavāśrayatā bhedakalaṅkam
GSP30partrvpu:1203_2: udvahatu nāmadheyamātreṇa paratvam iti vaktuṃ yuktam /
GSP30partrvpu:1207: tad etad eva bhavati saṃgacchate ca yadi prathamataraṃ sarvacarame evamābhāsā patantī tatraiva vimarsenāpi padaṃ bandhayet /
GSP30partrvpu:1208: sa hi caramo bhāgas tathā tāvat svātmarūpaṃ bibhrat tatsvātmarūpanāntarīyakatāsvīkṛtatadanantanijapūrvapūrvatarādibhāgāntaro bhāsamāno vimṛśyamānaś ca pūrṇa eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1209_2: bhāsamāno vimṛśyamānaś ca tathaivākhaṇḍita ity evaṃ tatpūrvapūrvagatā bhāsā tattaddvitrādinijanijottarabhāgabhāsā

GSP30partrvpu:1456: Q: tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja /
GSP30partrvpu:1457: Q: ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi tat tyaja //
GSP30partrvpu:1458: iti / tad iyam etāvatī dhārā yac chodhanam api śodhyam eveti śrīṣaḍardhaśāstre eva eka utkarṣaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1459: tisṛṇām api cāsāṃ yugapat sthitir bhavaty eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1460: vakti hy anyat vikalpayaṃś cānyat jalpaty avikalpam eva anyat paśyati /
GSP30partrvpu:1461: atra tu paripūrṇa eva tāvati bhagavān bhairava evetyādy anubhavasaṃpradāyopadeśapariśīlanenāsyārthasya svasaṃvinmayasyānapalāpanīyatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1462: na tad yugapat api tu tathāsauksmyād alaksaṇam iti yaugapadyābhimānaḥ śirīṣakusumapallavasatavyatibheda iveti cet keyaṃ khalu bhāṣā yugapad iti /
GSP30partrvpu:1463: samānakālam iti ced antarmukhe samvidātmani proktanayena kaḥ kālaḥ tasya jñeyarūpaprāṇagamāgamādimayābhāsatadabhāvaprāṇatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1464: jñeyopādhigato'pi jñānam avaskandet sa iti cej jñeyasya svātmani bhāsāmaye 'nyathā vā kasya niveśo jñānamukhe noktaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1466: svato bhedād ityādy api sarvam ucyamānaṃ jñānamukham evāpatet tathā ca sa eva doṣaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1470: bahutarakusumapallavasatavyatibhedo 'pi cāneka ity ucyamāne sarvatra sūkṣmaparamāṇvantāvayavayogān nāsti karma ity āpatet /
GSP30partrvpu:1471: na cānusaṃdhānaṃ jñānābhāvena saha syād anusaṃdhāyāḥ smṛtibhede tasyāś cānubhavopajīvitve 'nubhavābhāvābhāvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1472: vitatya ca vicāritaṃ mayaitat padārthapraveśanirṇayaṭīkāyām iti kim iha vṛthāvāgjālena prakṛtopadeśavighnaparyavasāyinā /
GSP30partrvpu:1473_0: evaṃ bhagavaty aparā sodhakabhāvena sthitā parā parāparāpi ca yatra bhagavatīnām
GSP30partrvpu:1473_1: aghoradīnāṃ śaktīnāṃ sthitir yadyogād vijñānākalasādhakayogino mantramahesādirūpeṇāghorādyāḥ saṃpannāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1475: parameśvaro hi bhairavabhaṭṭārakaḥ samagraśaktipuñjaparipūrṇanirbharavapur nijaśaktiniveśanayā brāhmyādīn
GSP30partrvpu:1477: evaṃ śodhakasyāpi śodhyatvam ity anya utkarṣaḥ
GSP30partrvpu:1480: tataś ca śodhyaśodhanaśodhakānāṃ sarvatraiva tryātmakatvāt trikam anapāyi yathoktaṃ mayaiva stotre
GSP30partrvpu:1482: iti / na caivam anavasthā sarvasyāsya bhagavatparasaṃvidekamayatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1485: śodhanam api antataḥ śodhako 'pi vā bhedāṃśocchalattāyāṃ pāśātmakatvāt śodhya eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1486: śodhanaṃ ca paramārthataḥ sarvamalaploṣacaturabhairavasaṃvidabhedihutavaha eva sarvasyānupraveśe paripūrṇataiva /
GSP30partrvpu:1495: tad evaṃ kṛtakariṣyamāṇādyanantasaṃketagarbhīkāreṇaivāyaṃ śodhyaśodhakabhāvo na cānavasthā na cātiprasaṅgo nāvyaptir na saṃketitasyāpāramārthikateti sthitam /
GSP30partrvpu:1497: akārādyā eva kālayogena somasūryau yau tau tadantaḥ prakīrtitāv iti saṃbandhaḥ/
GSP30partrvpu:1501: tām antareṇākulam api turyātītaṃ nāma na kiṃ cit sauṣuptapadāviṣṭatvāt turyānantaratāyā api samānatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1502: vimarśaśaktiś ca parā parameśvarī bhairavabhaṭṭārakasya niratiśayasvātantryātmikā
GSP30partrvpu:1504: tatra yady api na kaś cid atra kramayaugapadyodayakalaṅkaḥ proktopadeśanayenaitāvatyāḥ parābhaṭṭārikāsaṃvido 'nantāgāmipralayodayātmakasvasvabhāvavimarśaikaghanatvāt
GSP30partrvpu:1505: Q: svatantraḥ paripūrṇo 'yaṃ bhagavān bhairavo vibhuḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1506: Q: tan nāsti yan na vimale bhāsayet svātmadarpaṇe //
GSP30partrvpu:1507: iti nītyā kramayaugapadyāsahiṣṇusvātmarūpamadhya eva yāvat kramākramāvabhāsas tāvat tadanusāreṇāyaṃ kramo vicāraṇīyaḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:1508: akramasya tatpūrvakatvena saṃvidy eva bhāvāt pratipādanāyās tu sarvathaiva sakramatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1509: tathā ca sarva evāyaṃ vāgrūpaḥ parāmarśaḥ kramika eva,
GSP30partrvpu:1510: antaḥsaṃvinmayas tv akrama eveti sadaiveyam evaṃvidhaiva evam eva vicitrā pārameśvarī parābhaṭṭārikā /
GSP30partrvpu:1512: evaṃ parameśvarasya svātmanīcchātmikā svātantryaśaktir anunmīlitabhāvavikāsā tathāvidhāntarghanasaṃvitsvabhāvavimarśasārā ``a'' ity ucyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1513: sa cāvasthā iccheti vyapadeśyā iṣyamānānudrekā tata evānuttarasattāparāmarśātmikaiva eṣā /
GSP30partrvpu:1517_0: parameśvaraḥ satataṃ svasvarūpāmarśako 'kulaśaktipadātmakam api rūpam āmṛśan yady
GSP30partrvpu:1517_1: api kulaśaktīr anuyātu tathāpi kulaparāmarśato 'sya syād eva viśeṣa iti bhairavaśaktimadvimarśasatteyam /
GSP30partrvpu:1518: tādṛśy eva punaḥ prasarantī ānandaśaktiḥ ``ā'' iti /
GSP30partrvpu:1523: ``ū'' iti / tad evam ete parameśvarasya bhairavasya dve śaktī,
GSP30partrvpu:1524: prathamā svarūpaparipūraṇārūpatvāt pūrṇā cāndramasīśaktyavyatirekāc ca sahomayā vartata iti somarūpā svānandaviśrāntibhāvā icchākhyā kalanā mahāsṛṣṭivyapadeśyā,
GSP30partrvpu:1526_0: dvitīyā tu tatsvarūpabhāvarāśirecanānupraveśād riktā tadrecanād eva kṛśā bhāvamaṇḍalaprakāśanaprasāraṇavyāpārā
GSP30partrvpu:1527_0: tatrāpi ca prasaratatprāktanarūpaparyālocanāvasāt svātmani yathākramaṃ somasūryarūpatāyugalakabhāvena
GSP30partrvpu:1527_1: svasaṃvidātmakaṃ bhāvākhyaṃ ca rūpam apekṣya viparyayo 'pi somasūryātmakasṛṣṭisaṃhṛtikalanayoḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1532: yāvad dhi ghaṭādāv api vijñānaṃ jāyate tāvad eva jñeyaghaṭādyaṃśakarburīkṛtasvayaṃprathaṃ jñānaṃ prathata eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1533: tatrāpi ca tadrūpakarburībhāve ghaṭādiprathamasūkṣmollāso'pi saṃvedya ekabhāvodgamasya anyataḥ kutaś cid abhāvasya prathamānatvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1537: saṃvida eva svātantryaṃ bhāvojjigamiṣātmakam īśanaṃ svasaṃvitpramāṇalabdham eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1539: svātmany ānandaghano bhavaṃs tathā svatantraḥ syād ity ānando 'pi nāpahnavanīyaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1540: anuttaraś ca śaktimān avyapadeśyaparacamatkārasāro bhairavabhaṭṭārakaḥ sarvatra kartṛtvena bhāsata eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1541_1: jñānabhūmim adhiśayānānāṃ tā eva bhagavatyaḥ saṃvicchaktayaḥ samāpatanty ananyā eva svayaṃ saṃvidaḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:1542: paripūrṇatvenābhedāt saṃvedyopādheś ca bhedakatvāt tasya dehasaṃvedyamātratayaiva bhāvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1543: ata eva śrītantrasāre nijottamāṅgacchāyā tattvam ity uktam
GSP30partrvpu:1544: Q: svapadā svaśiraśchāyāṃ yadval laṅghitum īhate /
GSP30partrvpu:1545: Q: pādoddeśe śiro na syāt tatheyaṃ baindavī kalā //
GSP30partrvpu:1546: iti / tad evaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ pravṛttaṃ jñānaśaktyantam /
GSP30partrvpu:1549: tatra yad yad anyavyāmiśritasāṃkaryam anyasaṃbandhād eti tat tad anāmarśanīyaśūnyaprāyasvarūpākramaṇapuraḥsarīkāreṇa tathā bhavati plavānām iva bhekādiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1552: api tu kramasahiṣṇutvāt saṃrambha icchaiveśanāntā svātmany anuttarānandapade ca prasaraṇakṣamā /
GSP30partrvpu:1553: tataḥ saiva śūnyātmakaṃ svaṃ vapur avagāhamānā bhāsvaraṃ rūpaṃ tejomayam iva prathamaṃ gāhate ``ṛ ḥ'' iti /
GSP30partrvpu:1558: iti / śūnye hi niścale rūpe anupravivikṣāyāṃ bhāsvararūpasaṃvittisopānākramaṇaṃ sthitam eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1563: tathā ca paryante īśanarūpataiva samagrabhāvātmasvarūpollaṅghanena dīrghataraṃ plutvā niścalāṃ śūnyāṃ sattām etīti plutatvam eti ``ḷvarṇasya dīrghā na santi'' iti nyāyāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1565: tac ca prāṅnītyā dīrghatvam eva pṛthag aparyeṣaṇīyam ity āstāṃ tāvat /
GSP30partrvpu:1566: etac catuṣkaṃ śūnyarūpatānupraveśād dagdhabījam iva ṣaṇṭharūpaṃ bhaṇyate na tu sarvathā bījarūpatvābhāvāt,
GSP30partrvpu:1569: laukikasukhādiṣu caivaṃvidhaiva viśrāntir ānandarūpeti tad evāmṛtabījacatuṣkam ity uktam /
GSP30partrvpu:1571: anuttaraparadhāmani ca prāgbhāvini svarūpād apracyāviny anupraviśya ``a ā i ī iti e'',
GSP30partrvpu:1574: anupraveśe cānuttarapadānupraveśe syād api kaś cid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1578: Q: chandogānāṃ sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyā ardham ekāram ardham okāraṃ cādhīyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1579: iti / loke'pi prākṛtadeśabhāṣādau sphuṭa eva pracuro niveśaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1580: pārameśvareṣv api ekāraukārayor ekāraukārāpekṣayā yad dhrasvatvam aṅgavaktrādiviniyoge dṛśyate tad evam eva mantavyam ardhaikārārdhaukārabhiprāyeṇa /
GSP30partrvpu:1582: etad api tathāśabalībhūtaṃ saṃvidvapus tathaiva tad eva rūpam anuvasat ``a ā e'' iti ai /
GSP30partrvpu:1583: evam unmeṣe'pi vācyam ``a ā u ū iti o'' /
GSP30partrvpu:1585: kevalam unmeṣo jñānaśaktyātmā prasaran yady api śūnyatāvagāhanam kuryāt tathāpi asyeśanecchātmakobhayarūpapraveśa eva śūnyatā,
GSP30partrvpu:1586: iccheśanayos tu svaparivṛttirūpaṃ nāstīty uktanayenaiva sthitiḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1587: evam icchājñāne anuttarasvarūpānupraveśena prāptopacaye paścāt parityajya tathāvidhopādhiparispandasattām abhedasattārohaṇacinmayapuruṣatattvasatattvavedanārūpabindumātrāvaśeṣeṇa
GSP30partrvpu:1592: tathāhi aukāre eva kriyāśaktiparispandaḥ parisamāpyate itīcchājñānayor atraivāntarbhāvāt triśūlarūpatvam asya ṣaḍardhaśāstre nirūpitam
GSP30partrvpu:1596: vedanāmātrāvaśeṣam api viśvaṃ yadā svātmany ekagamanāya visṛjati svātmanaś ca sakāśāt tannirmāṇena visṛjati sa eva parameśvaraḥ,
GSP30partrvpu:1599: aukāraparyante hi nirbharībhūte kriyāśaktiprasare etāvad anupraviṣṭam /
GSP30partrvpu:1608: Q: ekam eva hi tat tattvaṃ na saṃkhyāto 'tiriktatā /
GSP30partrvpu:1609: iti yac chivatattvam eva anantavicitrasvātantryasphārasphuraṇaśakticamatkārabharitatopāttabhairavabhāvaṃ nirṇītaṃ tatrāyam evoktakramaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1612: Q: tadicchā tāvatī tāvaj jñānaṃ tāvat kriyā hi sā //
GSP30partrvpu:1620: Q: jānāti jñānam atraiva niricchor vedanakṣatiḥ //
GSP30partrvpu:1621: Q: aunmukhyābhāvatas tasya nivṛttir nirvṛtiṃ vinā /
GSP30partrvpu:1622: Q: dveṣye pravartate naiva na ca vetti vinā citim //
GSP30partrvpu:1624: Q: yata icchati taj jñātuṃ kartuṃ vā secchayā kriyā /
GSP30partrvpu:1625: Q: tasyāḥ pūrvāparau bhāgau kalpanīyau purā hi yā //
GSP30partrvpu:1627: Q: na caunmukhyaprasaṅgena śivaḥ sthūlatvabhāk kvacit //
GSP30partrvpu:1630: tac ca dharādiśaktyantaṃ kādikṣāntarūpam ity etavatī visargaśaktiḥ ``ṣoḍaśī kalā'' iti gīyate
GSP30partrvpu:1631: Q: puruṣe ṣoḍaśakale tām āhur amṛtāṃ kalām /
GSP30partrvpu:1632: iti eṣā hi na saṃkhyeyā nāpi vaidantikī dṛg api tu śaivy eva /
GSP30partrvpu:1634: evaṃ hy akārādirūpaṃ ghanatāpattyā yonirūpatāṃ gṛhītvā svarūpāpracyutaṃ tad eva svasvarūpa eva yonirūpe saṃkrāmad visargapadam ity ucyate / yathoktam
GSP30partrvpu:1635: Q: sa visargo mahādevi yatra viśrāntim ṛcchati /
GSP30partrvpu:1636: Q: guruvaktraṃ tad evoktaṃ śakticakraṃ tad ucyate //
GSP30partrvpu:1658: tad evaṃ śivabījam eva svātantryād ghanībhūtatayā kvacid vapuṣi śāktarūpe kusumatayā tiṣṭhad yonir ity abhidhīyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1659: tad eva hi puṣpaṃ purvoktanayena grāhyagrāhaṇagrāhakakoṇatrayamayaṃ vastutaḥ prasūtipadaṃ bījasaṃmiśratayaiva bhavati,
GSP30partrvpu:1662: tathā ca tat kusumam eva trikoṇatayā yonirūpam /
GSP30partrvpu:1663_1: pārameśvarī bhairavī bhaṭṭārikā mudrā tadrūpayonyādhāratayā yonir iti nirdiṣṭā /
GSP30partrvpu:1664: tathā ca śrīkubjikāmate khaṇḍacakravicāre amum evārthaṃ pradhānatayādhikṛtyādiṣṭam
GSP30partrvpu:1671: ityādi / ata eva tathāvidhabījakusumaikaghanabhāvaśivaśaktisaṃghaṭṭaḥ svayaṃ svātmanaiva pūjya ity upadiṣṭaṃ śrītrikatantrasāre
GSP30partrvpu:1675: iti / evaṃ ca ghanībhāvo 'pi vaikharīrūpe yady api sphuṭībhavati tathāpi sarvasarvātmani parāvāgvapuṣi mukhyatayāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP30partrvpu:1676: tatra paraṃ kaṇṭhoṣṭhasthānakaraṇāny api sarvasarvātmakam eveti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1677: tathā hy antar api saṃjalpet paśyed iti sphuṭa evānubhavo bhedaś ca sthānādikṛta eva,
GSP30partrvpu:1684: ata eva saṃvāravivārālpaprāṇamahāprāṇatāśvāsanādānupradānādiyogo'pi cāntas tathāsamucitasvabhāvaḥ syād eva,
GSP30partrvpu:1689_0: tad anayā yuktyā nibhālitayāntar adhikam adhikam anupraviśya pariśīlayata tāṃ samvidaṃ
GSP30partrvpu:1695: ayaṃ varṇa iti kathaṃkāraṃ vibhāga iti ced yad evaṃ svātantryaṃ tathāvidhe svātmani ghaṭo 'yam,
GSP30partrvpu:1698: jñātāham ity avabhāsayati tasyaivaṃvidhacitratararūpāvabhāsena ko vā kiyān vā prayāsaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1700: tathā hi vīṇāvipañcīkacchapikāmurujādiṣu sa eva svano 'nyato 'nyato deśād apy udbhavann ekasthāna iti kathyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1702: ata eva ca sa eva varṇaḥ kva cit prāṇini
GSP30partrvpu:1703: sthānāntarasamullāsy api bhavati yathā dhvāṃkṣeṣu kakāraṭakārarephā uccarantaḥ sarva evodarapāyukaṇṭhatālunirvartyā upalabhyante /
GSP30partrvpu:1704: avyaktatve 'pi ta eva tāvantaḥ śabdatvāt śabdasya ca mātṛkātirekino 'bhāvāt /
GSP30partrvpu:1705: mātṛkātireky api avyaktaḥ śabdo 'nupayogān na saṃgṛhīta ity apy ayuktam /
GSP30partrvpu:1706: avyaktavarṇarūpasyāpi maurujasāmudrādidhvanitasya hlādaparitāpakāritvam api asty eveti ko 'nyo 'bhimata upayogaḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1707: pārameśvare 'pi avyaktadhvaner mukhyatayaiva prāyaśo mantratvaṃ nirūpitam ardhacandrādīnām eva mantravyāptisāratvenābhidhānāt / tatra ca
GSP30partrvpu:1711: Q: hayo heṣati yadvac ca dānta udravatīva ca /
GSP30partrvpu:1712: Q: siṃho garjati yadvac ca uṣṭraḥ sītkurute yathā //
GSP30partrvpu:1713: Q: tathodīrya paśoḥ prāṇān ākarṣanti balādhikāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1717: vastutas tv āntara evāsau nādātmā mantra iti tu kathyamānaṃ bhavadbhir api asmābhir api vyaktavarṇamālādimantreṣv api na na saṃcārayituṃ śakyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1721: tasmād avyakto varṇātmaiva śabdo yathā vidūragato'pi ghaṭo ghaṭa eva iti sthitam /
GSP30partrvpu:1722: sa ca prāṇabheryādibhedena sthānāntaram api anusaran sa evety api sthitam /
GSP30partrvpu:1723: ata evedanīṃ sarvabhūtarutajñānaṃ yac cheṣamuninā bhagavatopadiṣṭaṃ taddhṛdayaṃgamībhūtaṃ,
GSP30partrvpu:1724_0: anyathā śabdārthapratyayānāṃ ya itaretarādhyāso yaś ca dhyānadhāraṇāsamādhisaṃyamena
GSP30partrvpu:1725: yadā tu ta eva varṇā varṇānām eva ca paramārthato 'rthatādātmyalakṣaṇaṃ vācakatvam tadā yuktyāta eva vihagādirutajñānam /
GSP30partrvpu:1726: bheryādiśabdā api hy arthavanta eva jayājayasūcakatayopadeśād vihagādirutavat /
GSP30partrvpu:1727: tadabhiprāyeṇaiva śikṣāsūtrakārasūtrāṇi havisarjanīyāv urasyāv ekeṣāṃ radanamūlam ekeṣām
GSP30partrvpu:1728: ityādīni vācakībhavanti na tv aparathā kathaṃcid api /
GSP30partrvpu:1729: ata eva kiṃcid vaicitryam ālambyānyatvam anyatvaṃ cāśaṅkamānaiḥ visarjanīyāj jihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyau,
GSP30partrvpu:1731: ḍakāraḍhakārayaralavakṣakārebhyaḥ tān eva laghuprayatnatarān bhedenābhimanya catuḥṣaṣṭir varṇā uktāḥ /
GSP30partrvpu:1735: Q: tad eva kulacakraṃ tu tena vyāptam idaṃ jagat //
GSP30partrvpu:1741: padārthaḥ saṃkalpyamānaḥ sākṣātkriyamāṇo vāmāyīyāsāṃketikasvarūpabhūtaśuddhavimarśātmaparavāṅmantramahāmahasi tāvat pratiṣṭhāṃ bhajate yatra sarvavādibhir avikalpā daśā gīyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1744: vikalpo 'pi tatprasādotthaḥ tām eva saraṇim anusaret,
GSP30partrvpu:1749: tathā ca yad eva tad asāṃketikaṃ mantravapus tad eva anyonyavicitrarūpaṃ paśyadbhiḥ sarvajñaiḥ saṃketopāyam upāsyatayā upadiśyate /
GSP30partrvpu:1750: tatraiva cāsāṃketike vāṅmahasi tathā khalu māyīyāḥ saṃketāḥ patanti yathā ta evāmāyīyāsaṃketitamantratādātroyaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP30partrvpu:1751: tathāsvarūpapratipattir eva hi teṣāṃ vācakatābhāvo nānyaḥ kaś cit /

GSP30partrvpu:2759: vākcittacāpalam idaṃ mama tena devyās taccakracāracaturasthitayaḥ kṣamadhvam // 21//
